recent.comments: Amazing stay. Recommend it 100% great place and lovely people. THANK YOU FOR EVERYTHING!!

items.comments: Amazing stay. Recommend it 100% great place and lovely people. THANK YOU FOR EVERYTHING!!
Absolutely wonderful stay, I can not describe the need to see the sunrise every morning! Will love to return sometime in the future.

Getting to the area is not so easy (long drive, winding, foggy road) but once you are in the room, its view and environment simply makes the effort all worthwhile. Morning window view was true to photos: Living in the clouds. Be amazed by the changing view as time passes. Love the Japanese style bath with hot water. Bring your own essential oils for the soak! This family run business makes us feel at home with freshly prepared breakfast in the morning. We asked for vegan food and were treated with Taiwanese porridge with stir-fry cabbage, other conditments such as tofu, pickled vegs, etc. Lovely local food. There was coffee and bread as well. Thanks for the host's advice, we got some food for dinner at a 7-11 nearby because we checked-in late (6+ pm) and the cafe would have closed. One more thing: If driving from Taroko side towards Mararet's place, remember to check if there is road control from the Taroko website. If missed entry timing, you can't get there anymore.
Definitely coming back! The weather was great when weâ€™re there and we could see the whole sky of stars. Thank you for being a great host!:)

Xiulan and Ah Shiong were extremely welcoming and accommodating. Without their help navigating the town (moving around and understanding the local public transport network), we would not have been able to get around Xincheng as itâ€™s a quiet and small town. We planned to hike in Taroko Gorge and we were advised by the hosts to set off early due to road closures. However, we were late which caused us to miss the bus and Ah Shiong managed to arrange a taxi for us which luckily was at the bus station. Would recommend planning your transportation prior to arriving (unlike us) as the taxi cost us much more than elsewhere in Taiwan (500 NT for a 10-15 minute drive). Otherwise, place is cute and if youâ€™re lucky, you may be able to taste the hostsâ€™ homemade wine! Hope to be back to try other trails in Taroko Gorge.

very welcoming hosts, fetched us from the train station, introduced 1 day tour guides for us, the tour guides were very accommodating and knowledgeable, truly a good experience. felt like home, definitely want to go back.

â­ï¸ Must Stay In Hualien â­ï¸

If youâ€™re looking for a place to stay. Look no further. You must stay here. Itâ€™s a beautiful home located in the pristine mountainside of Hualien ğŸ”ï¸

First off - the views here are amazing. Wake up and get greeted by the sound of cows moo-ing in the distance, step outside and breathe the fresh mountain air, watching the sun kiss your skin.

Second - the hospitality of the owners here are unmatched. We joined them at night for a drinking session of homemade rice wine and plum wine. Both tasted amazing and were made by the owners. In the morning, we woke up at 430am and hopped on the tractor to head to the beach to catch the sun-rise. Needless to say the view was also amazing. After which lady boss made breakfast for us, which filled our bellies!

If youâ€™re ever in Hualien, stay here, you donâ€™t regret it!

name: Penghu Magong Destination Inn - Family Room for 6
title: Magong, Taiwan

description.summary:
â˜This is a room with TOTO Washlet, a 39' JVC TV, and a electric kettle.
â˜Shampoo, shower gel and towels provided.
â˜Due to environment concerns, we are not providing non-reusable toiletries, so please bring your own toothbrush and toothpaste.
â˜Airport or harbor shuttle service available.
â˜ No Pets Allowed.
â˜Public Area is not open from 22p.m. to 7 a.m. Please lower your voice within this time period.
description.access: We have a spacious front garden that allows guests to have a nice barbecue there. There is also a lobby and two public places respectively on the 2nd and 3rd floor that you use freely.
description.notes:
â˜Our minsu is close to the Wude Elementary school and is located in a residential district. We are close to the Shihli beach and Shanshuei beach. (within 8 mins by riding scooter.)
â˜There is NO room cleaning service during your staying (for over 2 nights), but please let us know if you really need it.
description.interaction: This is a minsu (a kind of Inn in local Taiwan) which provides not only accommodations but also trip planning and locomotive rental. If you need any help with your trip plans, just let me know, and we can help you.
description.house_rules:
- - No shoes in the room, and we'll prepare in-door slippers for you.
- - Please lower your voice after 10 p.m.

recent.comments: Our stay was magical! It's a stunning oasis that photos don't do justice. Yvette was extremely patient with the # of questions I had from last minute planning and did her best to help me plan my travels. What really makes this place is the hospitality. Thank you so much to Benny & Lena for their thoughtfulness, good company, and great recommendations. Will definitely be returning!

description.summary: An european architectural hide in the forest. There have plenty wild animals and plants surround here, it's really suitable for family and children to get close to the nature; or take a vacation with your old friends to get yourself out of the city. The water here comes from the mountain spring, taste sweet therefore people always like to come for the hot spring and have some coffee and tea here.
description.space:
The Crystal Room is the room closest to the terrace, with the bedroom located on the lower level and the upper level serving as a Japanese-style tatami tea room.The bedroom features a desk and chair positioned beside the floor-to-ceiling glass window, offering a view of the mountainside. 

For our tea selection and incense, we have invited Asaban Tea to provide two varieties of tea and incense chosen specifically for each season in our mountain retreat. We aim to create a sense of ceremony during your visit to the mountains, allowing you to savor the tranquility and beauty of life through a cup of fine tea and the ambiance of the forest.

People in the mountains are wealthy since they own nature. But at the same time, there will be no convenient way of living here. Therefore, travelers who seek convenience should carefully consider before visiting.

Our home is within nature, and we insist on not using pesticides or harming the land in any way. Accordingly, we have all the creatures that live in nature. People who are sensitive to insects or wild animals are not recommended to visit.
description.access: private loft, outdoor space, shared living room, fire space, parking lot.
description.notes:
Check in/Check out:Â 
Check in:PM3:00 - PM19:30
Check out: AM11:00
////////////////////////////////////////////////
Shoufeng Station pick up/drop off serviceï¼š
Pick up: PM3:00 - PM18:00
Drop off: AM9:00 - AM 11:00
*(Not in the service timeï¼Œwe will charge 400NTD each car)
////////////////////////////////////////////////

The road to our place is one way mountain road, there are nine sharp turns way to here, please be careful (do not hesitate and doubt yourself during the way, just drive all the way to the end and please be aware of the wild animals anytime) .
description.neighborhood:
Our home is located in Feng-Tian of Hualien, there was the lively township because of mining the jade, the atmosphere makes travelers like to stay here during their leisure time. 

We have plenty natural resource, you can hear the frog, cicada, and Formosan Reeve's muntjac surround us. You also could see the eagles flying in the sky and the monkey jumping between the trees. 

The water comes from the mountain spring, many travelers enjoy to spent some leisure time to drink tea coffee here and enrich their life.
description.transit: The way to ShouFeng station is about 15 minutes by car, and 30 minutes to Hualien city. The hot spots surround here are a lot, all about 15 to 20 minutes. The most beautiful University  is a suitable place to having a leisure picnic time there. The township next to us is Fonglin, which has lots of famous foods such as stinky tofu, traditional lemonade and local cuisine.
description.interaction: The host will live with you in this fantastic town, and provide the free rides between our home and Shou-feng station. We'll share the experiences, travel informations and have some drinks with you, and prepare the handmade breakfast for you next morning :")

Enjoy a private time surrounded by peaceful mountains and  garden!

description.space:
Notice:
1. This room type offers 2 double bed, maximum occupancy: 4.

2. Children under the age of 13 and pets are not allowed. 

3. Smoking, and cooking are prohibited in the whole area. 

4. Change of date must be requested five days before the check-in date.

5. All room types must be reached by stairs. If you have high requirements for sound insulation, it is not recommended to book a room.

6. If you need extra quilts, the fee will be NTD 200 per piece (payment in cash at check-in), please inform at least one day before the check-in day.

7. Provides free breakfast (vegetarian food is available, other customized requests cannot be provided)

8. All passengers must bring their ID documents(ID cards or passport) for registration when checking in to ensure the safety of their accommodation.

9.Check-in time : 3pm~8pm. No check-in outside check-in hours.

In the room:
1. Mini bar , Alishan tea and coffee is provided.
2. Toiletries and hair towels is provided.
3. Disposable toiletries such as toothbrushes, toothpaste, shower caps, etc. are not provided.
4. With independent heating and cooling air conditioning, you can adjust the indoor temperature and humidity.
5. The balcony of this room type is a connecting balcony and may be shared with other customers. For private balcony room types, please send a message to inquire.

1. Exceeding the occupancy of the room, or bringing pets and children under the age of 12 will not be accepted and no refund will be given.

2. The application for changing the date must be applied five days before the check-in date, and the order date will not be changed within five days before the check-in date.

3. All room types must be reached by one level of outdoor stairs.

4. We are located in an open and quiet mountainous area, for those who require a high degree of sound insulation, please consider the reservation.

5. Extra quilts will be charged NTD200 per piece (payment in cash at check-in), please inform one day before the latest check-in day, and no additional items will be added on the day of check-in.

6. All passengers must bring their ID documents(ID cards or passport) for registration when checking in to ensure the safety of their accommodation.

7. Check-in time : 3pm~8pm. No check-in outside check-in hours.

description.space: The setting and atmosphere of our exotic hostel ensures your stay is both memorable and enjoyable. The walls are decorated with pop culture memorabilia and joyful memories of previous guest that's eye candy at every turn of your head. The spacious rooms and lobby area give you comfort wherever you choose to rest during your travels. Our fully equipped kitchen is ever-ready just in case you're craving a home cooked meal to satisfy your taste buds. Wait no more and book your next travel experience here with us!

description.house_rules:
NiHao ğŸ‘‹ , Dear Global Guest Traveler :

For your personal hygiene and health, please bring your own "private and close-fitting towels and bath towels" for daily use.
(Recommendation: Quick-dry technology towel for travel)
In order to reduce the production of garbage on the earth, to be an environmental traveler, we start from ourselves,
You only need to bring the "toothbrush and toothpaste" that you will use every morning.
This will make our planet healthier and cleaner.

House Rules :
Without Breakfast/No breakfast is served.
Without Towel & Toothbrush/No repetitive personal items towels and disposable toothbrushes are provided.
  (For the Personal Health & For a Green Better Earth)
  (For better personal hygiene and a greener earth, a better future environment)

There are more than 6 breakfast shops in the area within a 2-minute walk

There is a 24hrs professional self-service laundry and drying shop within a 2-minute walk

There are 24hrs 7-11, Family Mart, OK Mart within 2 minutes walk

Free use of kitchen and washing machine.

Night quiet time: 22:00-07:00,
Statutory quiet time: please keep quiet after 22:00, so as not to affect the peace of the community and others.

Keep the house and public spaces clean and tidy.
Properly use all items in the house without damage or injury.
Respect the space use rights of all travelers staying in the hotel.
Treat hosts and hosts with respect, and everyone.


Self Check-in the house
after 15:00 after finished cleaning up.

ğŸ”‘

Check-in time: after 15:00 (afternoon)
Check-out time: before 11:00 (morning)

P.S.
When checking in at Check-in, please be sure to bring the passport of the person who intends to rent the house or the ID card used for entry.
(Same as the check-in procedures for accommodation regulations such as airport counters, hotel resorts and homestays. It is possible for the police and public security agencies to come to check and verify the identity)

Other considerations:
Rental services such as house rental and car rental must provide legal documents for registration.
(like hotels, restaurants, resort rentals, airport boarding)

The rental house is a self-check-in house (no 24hrs counter service):

âš ï¸In order to avoid any illegal and criminal activities, after booking a rental house, you need to provide the landlord your TW local ID card or international passport online to obtain the dayâ€™s key code and house guide for the self-check-in rental house, and you can easily enter the house by yourself And rest, very convenient and fast.

Thank you very much.

items.comments: We requested extra beds, but they forgot to put them.  I sent email and everything was fixed within 20 min. Very efficient!
We enjoyed our stay at this house. During the process Claire was extremely helpful and responsive. Great location and you walk to a of stuff.
The host is very responsive and gets back to me quickly whenever I have any questions or needs.  It was a great experience staying at her beautiful place.  Highly recommend!

Beautiful place in the very convenient location! 
Claire is a great host with super prompt communication. We will definitely visit again,

Very kind host- helped us think of solutions since we had to check in earlier. Is very responsive esp when i indicate that the detergent is empty, replaced lockâ€™s battery immediately when i express concerns that it may be out of batt soon. Overall, a very beautiful house. Stairs can be quite narrow and steep so please be careful. Aircon is new and powerful! Super helpful during summer. :)

Secluded Farmhouse Retreat: Discover serenity near Taipei, at this private farmhouse cottage. Designed by architect sisters, this cozy retreat offers minimalist charm and comfort. Ideal for families and friends (4-6 guests), it's the perfect countryside escape. Enjoy panoramic views from the dining area, while the front yard's deck with hanging chairs invites relaxation. Experience an unforgettable tranquil retreat in Yilan.
description.space:
Tranquil Countryside Haven: Architect-Crafted Farmhouse Retreat near Taipei

Indulge in the allure of a secluded farmhouse cottage nestled in the outskirts of Yilan, just a stone's throw away from Taipei. Designed and handcrafted by the homeowners, architect sisters, this vacation home embodies the essence of rustic luxury. With an open-concept kitchen and dining area, it embodies the concept of gathering and sharing cherished moments with loved ones. The dining table becomes the heart of emotional connections and joyful occasions. The large floor-to-ceiling glass panels bring the stunning greenery of the countryside indoors, allowing you to enjoy the picturesque views while preparing meals from the vegetable garden, creating unforgettable memories with family and friends.

The rooms exude a cozy and warm atmosphere, featuring two double beds with textured wooden sliding doors. Beyond the sliding doors, you'll find a comfortable living space with a double sofa bed, providing flexible sleeping arrangements for up to six guests.

Outside, the lush courtyard beckons with its vibrant greenery and a tranquil ecological pond. The wooden deck with hanging chairs in the front yard is the perfect spot for relaxation and rejuvenationâ€”a haven that will make it difficult to leave this serene getaway in Yilan.

Escape to this enchanting farmhouse retreat, where the homeowners' architectural expertise has created a haven of tranquility and comfort, offering an unforgettable journey into the heart of Yilan's serenity.

Friendly Reminders:

Check-in time: After 4:00 PM
Check-out time: Before 12:00 PM (noon)

We provide bedding and amenities for 4-6 people (2 double beds + 1 sofa bed). Please inform us of the number of guests when making a reservation.

The farmhouse does not have a television and does not provide meals. However, the kitchen is equipped with a refrigerator, gas stove, microwave, electric kettle, small oven, rice cooker, dinnerware, cookware, and basic condiments. There is a 7-11 convenience store across the farmhouse.

Barbecuing and pets are not allowed, and smoking is prohibited indoors. Drug use and parties are strictly prohibited.

As we are located in a rural area surrounded by nature, please prepare mosquito repellent.

items.comments: Lovely,  relaxing place to stay - we had the whole floor and the back bedroom had a beautiful little balcony overlooking the pretty back garden. The check-in was very easy - the lady who showed us around was extremely friendly and helpful, although it helped that our daughter was able to talk to her in Mandarin. We really enjoyed our stay - thank you!
A very convenient place to stay for having fun around Sun Moon Lake. The host is friendly, very quick to respond and always helpful. Check-in and -out are easy.

name: Penghu Magong Destination Inn - Family Quad
title: Magong, Taiwan

items.comments:
Clean and spacious room. 
The hosts were very kind and helpful. 

Would recommend Destination Inn to any travelers visiting Penghu.

description.summary:
â˜This is a room with two standard double beds, TOTO Washlet, a 39' JVC TV, and a electric kettle.
â˜Shampoo, shower gel and towels are provided in the washroom.
â˜Due to environment concerns, we are not providing non-reusable toiletries, so please bring your own toothbrush and toothpaste.
â˜Airport or harbor shuttle service available.
â˜Breakfast provided.
â˜ No Pets Allowed.
â˜Public Area is not open from 22p.m. to 7 a.m. Please lower your voice within this time period.
description.access: We have a spacious front garden that allows guests to have a nice barbecue there. There is also a lobby and two public places respectively on the 2nd and 3rd floor that you use freely.
description.notes:
â˜Our minsu is close to the Wude Elementary school and is located in a residential district. We are close to the Shihli beach and Shanshuei beach. (within 8 mins by riding scooter.)
â˜There is NO room cleaning service during your staying (for over 2 nights), but please let us know if you really need it.
description.neighborhood: As you may know the "Twin Hearts Stone Weir" in Ci-mei, we have our own family "Stone Weir" that we can take you there to experience the ancestor's wisdom if you're interested in. Just please let us know in advance so that we can arrange our staff.
description.interaction: This is a minsu (a kind of Inn in local Taiwan) which provides not only accommodations but also trip planning and locomotive rental. If you need any help with your trip plans, just let me know, and we can help you.

recent.comments: La casa de Suli estÃ¡ muy bien tal y como aparece en las fotos , la localizaciÃ³n muy buena si vas la parque nacional, toda la familia muy agradables y ayudando en todo momento, muy buena experiencia . Gracias

items.comments: La casa de Suli estÃ¡ muy bien tal y como aparece en las fotos , la localizaciÃ³n muy buena si vas la parque nacional, toda la familia muy agradables y ayudando en todo momento, muy buena experiencia . Gracias

Sapah Suli hosts were very friendly and helpful. I had to teach online while staying here and they gave me clear information about their WIFI before we got here to confirm I will be able to do so. They also prepared a space for me to work, so I knew I will have everything I need when I needed it ahead of time. I am very grateful for their help with this responsibility. The place is very nice a close to Taroko gorge. Unfortunately, it is right above a busy road so if you are not used to steer noise, it might disturb your sleep. Other then that it was a perfect place from which to explore the park.
Great location right at the entrance to Taroko Gorge. The space is shared with the family who are super friendly! Photos are exactly as shown with great views. Cats are also cute ğŸ˜¼

description.notes:
1. To save the planet, please bring your own toothbrush, toothpaste and towel. SAPAH offers an Italian bath product which is eco-friendly and can be used as both shampoo and body wash.
2. We provide tissue paper which is water-dissolvable. Please throw it into the toilet after use.
3. We believe that travellers have autonomy, but at any time emergency situations can still contact the housekeeper..
4. Please don't turn the shower faucet to the leftmost to prevent from scalding.
5. Check-in time is 16:00. Checkout time is 12:00 pm. Please arrange your travel time in advance, and turn on the Taiwan Social Distancing App during your stay.
6. During the pandemic, SAPAH did not provide meal services, so be sure to plan a meal shop as soon as possible.
7. Please turn the volume down after 22:00.
8. SAPAH sits on the highest location in the village, which brings the opportunity to see the shining sunrise and the beautiful sky with stars at night. We recommend you pay a visit to the rooftop to see the stunning view. 
9. Please do not smoke in bed or in any place where smoking presents a fire hazard. Also, drinking in public area is not allowed for othersâ€™ right.

description.summary: An european architectural hide in the forest. There have plenty wild animals and plants surround here, it's really suitable for family and children to get close to the nature; or take a vacation with your old friends to get yourself out of the city. The water here comes from the mountain spring, taste sweet therefore people always like to come for the hot spring and have some coffee and tea here.
description.space:
The master room is in the 2nd floor, 1st floor is the private living room. There also has a wide private bathroom inside, and a outdoor hot spring, using the mountain spring all the park.

The antique furnitures here are the collection of the host, comes from everywhere from the world. Using the antiques in the daily life let the furnitures have the second life.

The atmosphere makes people love to spent the leisure time here. We are looking forward to meet you, living in the fantastic town here with us.
description.access: private living room, outdoor hot spring, outdoor space, shared living room, fire space, parking lot.
description.notes:
Check in/Check out:Â 
Check in:PM3:00 - PM19:30
Check out: AM11:00
////////////////////////////////////////////////
Shoufeng Station pick up/drop off serviceï¼š
Pick up: PM3:00 - PM18:00
Drop off: AM9:00 - AM 11:00
*(Not in the service timeï¼Œwe will charge 400NTD each car)
////////////////////////////////////////////////

The road to home is one way mountain road, there are nine sharp turns way to here, please be careful (do not hesitate and doubt yourself during the way, just drive all the way to the end and please be aware of the wild animals anytime) .
description.neighborhood:
Our home is located in Feng-Tian of Hualien, there was the lively township because of mining the jade, the atmosphere makes travelers like to stay here during their leisure time. 

We have plenty natural resource, you can hear the frog, cicada, and Formosan Reeve's muntjac surround us. You also could see the eagles flying in the sky and the monkey jumping between the trees. 

The water comes from the mountain spring, many travelers enjoy to spent some leisure time to drink tea coffee here and enrich their life.
description.transit: The way to ShouFeng station is about 15 minutes by car, and 30 minutes to Hualien city. The hot spots surround here are a lot, all about 15 to 20 minutes. The most beautiful University  is a suitable place to having a leisure picnic time there. The township next to us is Fonglin, which has lots of famous foods such as stinky tofu, traditional lemonade and local cuisine.
description.interaction: The host will live with you in this fantastic town, and provide the free rides between our home and Shou-feng station. We'll share the experiences, travel informations and have some drinks with you, and prepare the handmade breakfast for you next morning :")

items.comments:
å¯¶æ¡‚çš„åœ°æ–¹éå¸¸å¥½ï¼We enjoyed every minute of our stay! Truly a great comfortable place to stay!
Extremely clean, and very professionally managed! Each bedroom and the living room are well equipped with tv, air conditioning and en-suite bathroom. The outdoor kitchen is equipped with gas burners, large pots, and utensils. The view of the mountain range is gorgeous. We found a bike trail next to the property, and drove to BiTouJiao for an excellent snorkeling experience. Others were surfing nearby.

items.comments:
host was very responsive and helpful even before my actual booking. even helped to arrange airport transport for me.

place was lovely, tastefully done and clean. the breakfast was awesome, healthy yet tasty. I had dinner there as well n the dinner was also simple but filled with goodness.

it is in a very rural area n really will be much easier for those with cars to drive out n explore.

the ice lollies next door n further down (a honey shop) are really fantastic, must try.

had a great stay there

description.space:
Laurel Villa opened its doors in January 2004. Since then we've had the privilege of serving guests from all over the world and are grateful for all the support and encouragement we've received.

We strive to live in harmony with nature and hope our guest can experience it by providing the most natural and comfortable living environment along with fresh and healthy meals.

Take a break from your busy schedule, visit us on your next trip to Sun Moon Lake and allow us to be part of your experience. We hope you'll be able to find peace and tranquil during your stay with us.
description.notes: Should you require us to recommend a sightseeing itinerary of Sun Moon Lake, feel free to enquire with us upon your arrival. We are more than happy to provide an introduction of the area and will discuss a suitable sightseeing schedule based on your duration of stay, interests and current weather conditions (different guests will have a unique schedule tailored to their needs).
description.neighborhood:
Shopping, food, accommodation, transport, parking and some of the attractions at Sun Moon Lake are within walking distance from Laurel Villa. 

Information of the various attractions is also readily available. 

Laurel Villa is accessible by car, scooter or public transport. 

After arriving at Sun Moon Lake, the best way to enjoy the scenery is to take a leisure stroll along some of the footpaths. Other than admiring the view of lake and the central mountain ranges in Taiwan, you can also see Wunwu Temple, Lalu Island, Cihen Pagoda, Syuanzang Temple, Syuanguang Temple and Ita Thao.

Should you require further information on the attractions of Sun Moon Lake, we will be glad to help you in planning a customized itinerary to meet your preferences or time constraints.

- Places within 1~3 minute of walking -
Shueishe pier (Sun Moon Lake's main pier)
Shueishe Lakeside Trail
Meihe Gardens (Strategic location for panoramic sight of the lake)
Hanbhi Hiking Trail (The late President CKS's favourite pathway)
7-Eleven, Starbucks
Zhong Xin Road carpark

- Places within 5 minutes of walking -
Shueishe Visitors Center
Restaurant and eateries serving Chinese, Western and local cuisine
Bus stop for public buses (plying local routes and areas outside Sun Moon Lake) 
Gift shops, specialty shops, pharmacy, bike and scooters for rent

- Places within 10 minutes of walking -
Longfong Temple & Matchmaker
Wen Wan Resort, Lalu Hotel & Teacher's Hostel
Chaowu pier

- Places within 30 minutes of walking -
Shueishe Dam Lakeside Trail
Bamboo Rock Garden
Mt. Maolan Hiking Trail
description.interaction: Almost every morning where weather allows, we will lead guests to view Sun Moon Lake's sunrise, grand morning scenery and provide introduction. This early morning activity will be entirely different from the other day activities available, hence we strongly recommend this activity to personally experience and appreciate Sun Moon Lake!
description.house_rules:
When checking in, please present your identification for verification and registration.
After 20:00, please lower the volume and forbidden to maintain the quality of your stay.
According to the smoke prevention method, the hotel is completely non-smoking, including rooms, bathrooms and balconies.
Please don't bring any drugs and dangerous goods (including any prohibited goods). If you have any illegal behavior, we must call the police.
Please be informed that we do not accept pets. Do not bring mahjong.
The kitchen and bar are not open to the public. Please inform in advance if you have any additional needs.
Do not use dangerous goods such as gas stoves or induction cookers indoors. Please turn off the power and save water.
If there is a demand for parking, it can be parked at the rear of Zhongxing Public Car Park. Guests staying at the hotel can enjoy preferential parking rates.
Do not arbitrarily move indoors (such as a bed). When you leave the room, please lock the door with your hand. Please keep your valuables carefully. When you check out, please return the door card.

description.summary: Blue roof is one of B & B which full of miss; it was opened in 2008, located in Puli, Tami eco-village, where the environment is very quiet, only three rooms, eight people can make blue roof to full the house. Blue roof is not only 726 legal B & B of Nantou County but also the smallest B & B belong to Nantou territory.
description.space: It has only three rooms however small but complete in every detail.  The space of accommodations includes a ground floor and a shared kitchen on the second floor. Color for White, green and blue are belong to the blue roof. Therefore, there are white wall, grass and the blue sky outside exterior courtyard
description.neighborhood:
The Blue Roof is located inside Taiwan's prestigious Tami Ecology Village. It is only 10 minutes from the community's Spiritual Paper Church. At night, there are also eco-guided activities that can be booked. Due to the central location of Po Puli Town, the nearby major attractions such as The famous Sun Moon Lake 30 minutes by car, 60 minutes by car from Qing Jing Farm. In this town, for example: the handicrafts industry of country side tourism, agricultural experience, natural landscape, temple culture and local snacks are also very multiple rich. Here included delicious and fun to do in Puli, letâ€™s come to here travel together.
However, the only thing to be noticed by travelers is that nearby no have convenience stores around the Blue Roof. Customers who purchase are usually required to drive for 10 minutes by themselves
We are welcome the vacation tourists come to the Blue roof to enjoy mind empty and leisure time.

items.comments: Great place, very close to the night market and Zhonghua bus stop.

The location was great. It was central and walkable to everything. Tom was responsive and friendly, and the room was spacious. 

The only cons were that the bathroom was a bit poorly ventilated and the toilet difficult to flush. There is no dryer though I believe one was listed. However these are just minor inconveniences. 

Overall though, I would recommend this place to anyone travelling in Hualien.

Kindly let us know your checking and checkout dates, we will try our best to satisfy your requests and provide you an unforgetable memories of your time in Taiwan. 

Foreigner friendly, perfect for long-term lease, good for 6 people (max). Close to MRT stations and various exotic restaurants and malls. 
PLEASE CONSULT before BOOKING.
description.space: 2 spacious bedrooms (King suite, Family room), 2 fabulous living rooms, 1 fully-furnished kitchen opens to dinning room. And, 1 play room on the first floor which will keep children busy.

Parking space, Advanced Reservation Required.

Suggest you can take MRT Brown/Green LINE to Nanjing Fuxing station, around 8 mins walking distance.

description.house_rules:
*Based on Article 10 of the provisions of the Accommodation Regulations, each client must abide by the following rules in order that all clients will be able to stay in our AirHome in a safe and comfortable atmosphere.
*If a guest does not abide by the regulations, that guest might be asked not to use our facilities, and that guest might be liable for any damages.
*For the customers who visit (for lunch or dinner) without reservations are asked to abide to the following regulations. 
*AirHome only accommodates the people who made the reservation. Neither strangers nor guests are allow to stay overnight. 
1.The use of fire in the hallway and or guest rooms for the purpose of heating and cooking is prohibited.
2.Do not smoke in an area where is easily to cause a fire, "NO Smoking in bed".
3.When not being used, do not touch the fire extinguisher.
4.Do not bother other guests, such as singing loudly, or any other noisy actions, etc.
5.The followings items are prohibited in the guest rooms.
*animals, birds
*the things with bad smell
*too many things
*flammable things such as gunpowder, benzine,etc..
*non-approved guns and swords
6.Gambling or any other behavior that is against public morals in the hallways or guest rooms is prohibited.
7.Inviting strangers into the guest rooms, to use the facilities and or amenities is prohibited.
8.The use of guest rooms or the lobby as an office is prohibited.
9.The use of facilities and or amenities in the hallways or the guest rooms for any other purpose is prohibited.
10.Removing items from guest rooms or moving them to other places in AirHome is prohibited
11.Installation of any foreign item into guest rooms/personal computer or any part of our building is prohibited.
12.Hanging of any items in guest room windows that might ruin the beauty of our AirHome appearance is prohibited.
13.Distribution of business flyers or any other business to clients in our AirHome is prohibited.
14.Leaving unattended luggage or other items in the hallway or lobby is prohibited.
15.Left and unclaimed items will be kept for a period of 2 days from your departure date, unless otherwise instructed.

name: Sun Moon Lake Cat b&b DORIS HOME 5mins to bus stop
title: Yuchi Township, Taiwan

hosts.about: I'm the host of DORIS HOME, a cat theme b&b located at Sun Moon Lake in Taiwan. You would love this small town if you spend some time with those beautiful bicycle and walking trails. Come to Sun Moon Lake and you would enjoy your vacation with cats.

recent.comments: Greg's place was exactly as described and even better! We had such a peaceful trip at sun moon lake and the stay was super comfortable with the free roaming cats which made the place 10 times better. We even got to spend some time playing with a few of them. The attention to detail at Greg's place was immaculate. Will definitely stay again if we're back in the area. Thanks Greg and team for a wonderful stay!

items.comments: Greg's place was exactly as described and even better! We had such a peaceful trip at sun moon lake and the stay was super comfortable with the free roaming cats which made the place 10 times better. We even got to spend some time playing with a few of them. The attention to detail at Greg's place was immaculate. Will definitely stay again if we're back in the area. Thanks Greg and team for a wonderful stay!
Very good service, beautiful room and cute cats! Hosts were very helpful in planning our trip at Sun Moon Lake and helping with transportation. Would definitely want to visit again!

description.summary: DORIS HOME is a cozy b&b with many cats in Sun Moon Lake. It is close to Shuishe Visitor Center, Shuishe Pier, Maolan Mountain Trail, and Xiangshan Bikeway in 10 minutes walking distance. We have one comfortable queen-size bed, spacious bathroom and hill view in this room. If you like a little sense of design with cozy easy space, DORIS HOME is your good choice to stay in Sun Moon Lake.
description.space:
â˜† 5 cute cats around.
â˜† Room space is 26 square meters and bed size is 182cm*190cm
â˜† Homemade breakfast from 8am to 10am
â˜† Shampoo, body soap
description.access: Except the room you stay, you could also spend some time in our public area on 1st floor. We have fresh coffee and Sun Moon Lake black tea anytime. You could enjoy a short break with our cats and take a rest.
description.notes:
Please consider again if you are allergic to cats.
We are next to a green hill so that you might meet some bugs or  mosquitoes easily.
We are located at a quiet lane, please help us to keep the peace during your stay.

No stay for children under 12 years old for safety reasons.
description.neighborhood:
There is a Maolan Moutain Trail close to our house and you could hike to the top in 1 hour. There is a good view of Sun Moon Lake if you reach the top.
Next to our building, there are 2 beautiful Japanese old houses on a hill which was built on 1936. Although they are not allowed to visit but you could see them gracefully standing there.
description.transit: 5 minutes walking distance to Shuishe Visitor Center, 10 minutes walking to Shuishe Pier. 7 minutes walking to a 7-11 shop, 8 minutes walking to a Starbucks. 10 minutes walking to the entrance of Xiangshan Bikeway. 10 minutes walking to the entrance of Hanbi Trail.
description.interaction: My family or I will be here to welcome you, but won't bother you too much. We will be around when you need us.

recent.comments: The owners were very friendly and provided great recommendations to tour sun moon lake! The room and breakfast was amazing as well :)

items.comments: The owners were very friendly and provided great recommendations to tour sun moon lake! The room and breakfast was amazing as well :)

A great host and a great place that is easily walkable from the sun moon lake visitor centre. Room was clean and entire place was very cosy and homely. highly recommended and will stay again the next time

The hosts were extremely accommodating and friendly as soon as we arrived. They gave us local recommendations and tweaked our itinerary in a way that made it more convenient for us. Breakfast served to the room was very homey :)

description.summary:
Tranquil and greenery
Let your soul immersed in our home
Bath your body with HERMEÌ€S or Chatzutang
Breakfast next morning tickles your taste buds

One foot steps toward mountains and the other toward Sun Moon Lake.
Arts fulfills in meditation, feels here like your home.

Downshifting, balance your work and life,
What you need is all in Sun Moon Inn.
description.space:
Pursue the sun and the moon, Away from the crowd.
Time to stay in esthetic the Sun Moon Inn for one night.
Enjoy the walk before the sun rising, ripples spreads across the lake.
Walk into the deep of the forest, go up the peak and overlook the hillside.
The sun shine emerges into the eyes, cuddling me warmly and tenderly.

After lingering with Mother Nature, here Iâ€™m back, Sun Moon Inn.
Be built up with BeÌton brut, it stands out in the ordinary view.
Surrounded with green and blue , Slightly change your working mode into the good mood.

Tranquil and greenery
Let your soul immersed in our home
Bath your body with HERMEÌ€S or Chatzutang

description.access:
â—Â In order to maintain the quality of accommodation, please according to the number of people in the room type you choose when having check-in. Sorry for not accepting the request of unexpected additional guests on the spot. If necessary, please confirm the sum of people with us in advance:
ã€€â–ºÂ For zero-to-2-year-old children shall pay 200 NTD per person.Â 
ã€€â–ºÂ 3-6 years old children shall pay 400 NTD per person, including breakfast only.Â 
ã€€â–ºÂ over 7-years old children will be charged extra fee of 1,000 NTD, including breakfast and spares.
â—Â For special festivals and Chinese New Year, the principle of no additional guests-adding is required. If necessary, please confirm with the butler in advance.
â—Â We are worried about dust mites and do not use quilts that cannot be cleaned. We use water-washed quilts and wash them after each use to prevent allergies. If you need to add quilts, you must pay forÂ extraÂ quilt. The cleaning fee is 350Â TWD.Â Thank you for yourÂ understandingÂ our Inn's insistence on cleaning.
â—Â Sun Moon Inn is running the business as B&B ,Â not a hotel, therefore, there is no 24-hour counter service, check-in time is: 15:30~19:00, please contact us if you wish to check in other time.
â—Â Check-out time is 11Â a.m..Â A 30-minute late check-out will incur an additional charge of 250Â NTDÂ per 30 minutes.
â— Free parking is available from 15:30 p.m. to 11 a.m. the next day (Please inform us in advance) , if the parking time exceeds original range of time, you will be requested to pay extra parking fee to the parking manager.
â—Â Breakfast serving time is from 8 to 9:30, please enjoy the breakfast at 1st floor before 9:30.
â—Sun Moon Inn is located in the residential area, please lower the volume to keep the quality of the cozy stay. If noises bother other tourists and neighbors, we have the right to ask you to leave right away and wonâ€™t return any refund, please keep in mind and thank you for your cooperation.

description.neighborhood: ã€€The Sun Moon Lake, located in the middle of Taiwan, with an elevation of 748 meters above sea level, is the only natural big lake in Taiwan. The southern part of La Lu Island is shaped like a new moon, and the northern part is shaped like a sun; hence the name Sun Moon Lake.
description.transit:
Transporation by driving
(1)Driving from Taipei southwards
ã€€*Route A: Freeway No.3 â†’ Wufeng System Interchange (Freeway No.6) â†’ get off at Ailan Interchange (continue on via Tai-14th Highway to Puli) â†’ Puli (continue on Tai-21st Highway) â†’Yuchiâ†’ Sun Moon Lake Shuishe Visitor Center â†’ drive on and Sun Moon Inn is only a minute away
ã€€*Route B: Freeway No.1 â†’ at Changhua System Interchange, take Freeway No. 3 toward southâ†’ Wufeng System Interchange (Freeway No.6) â†’ get off at Ailan Interchange (continue on via Tai-14th Highway to Puli) â†’ Puli (continue on Tai-21st Highway) â†’Yuchiâ†’ Sun Moon Lake Shuishe Visitor Center â†’ drive on and Sun Moon Inn is only a minute away
ã€€*Route C: Freeway No.3 â†’ get off at Caotun Interchange and take Tai-14th Highway to Puli â†’ Puli (continue on Tai-21st Highway) â†’Yuchi â†’ Sun Moon Lake Shuishe Visitor Center â†’ drive on and Sun Moon Inn is only a minute away
(2)Driving from Taichung
ã€€*Route A: Taichung â†’Zhongtou Expressway â†’get off at Zhongtou Interchange and take Freeway No.3 â†’Wufeng System Interchange (Freeway No.6) â†’ get off at Ailan Interchange (continue on via Tai-14th Highway to Puli) â†’ Puli (continue on Tai-21st Highway) â†’Yuchiâ†’ Sun Moon Lake Shuishe Visitor Center â†’drive on and Sun Moon Inn is only a minute away
ã€€*Route B: Taichung â†’ Taichung Road â†’ Dali â†’ Guoguang Road â†’ Wufeng â†’Tai-14th Highway â†’ Caotun â†’Tai-14th Highway â†’ Puli â†’ Tai-21st Highway â†’Yuchiâ†’ Sun Moon Shuishe Visitor Centerâ†’ drive on and Sun Moon Inn is only a minute away
(3)Driving from Kaohsiung Northwards
ã€€*Route A: Freeway No.1â†’ Tai-78th Expresswayâ†’Freeway No.3 â†’ get off at Zhushan Interchange â†’ Jiji(continue on Tai-3rd Highway and then get on Tai-16th Highway) â†’Shuili (continue on Tai-16th Highway) â†’Sun Moon Lake (onto Tai-21st Highway).
ã€€*Route B: Freeway No.3â†’get off at Zhushan Interchangeâ†’ Jiji (continue on Tai-3rd Highway and then get on Tai-16th Highway) â†’Shuili (continue on to Tai-16th Highway)

Transporation by bus
ã€€*Take the Sun Moon Lake Line of Nantou Bus opposite Taichung Railway Station.
ã€€*At THSR Taichung Station, toward No.5 Exit at street level, you will find Taiwan Tourist Shuttle service. Take their Sun Moon Lake line and get off at Shueishe Visitor Center.
ã€€*Take Sun Moon Lake Line of Kuo-Kuang Motor Transportation at Taipei Railway Station.
ã€€*In a diagonal direction across from Kaohsiung Railway Station, take the Puli Line of Kuo-Kuang Motor Transportation or Ubus and transfer to Nantou Bus for Sun Moon Lake.
ã€€*Take the Sun Moon Lake Line of Taiwan Tourist Shuttle service at Taichung airport and get off at Shueishe Visitor Center.
ã€€*Walking form Shueishe Visitor Center to Sun Moon Inn only 3 minutes.

location.address: Ruifang District, New Taipei City, Taiwan

recent.comments: Great place with spectacular view. Walking distance from Jiufen Old Street. Host made breakfast for us!

items.comments: Great place with spectacular view. Walking distance from Jiufen Old Street. Host made breakfast for us!

Nice bed and breakfast hotel a few steps away from the Jiufen pedestrian zone with all the attractions.
Very friendly and proactive host.
Enter this text into you maps search, otherwise hard to find:
"GOOD TIME B&B"

Dreamy homestay! I loved waking up to such a spectacular view every morning. I was reluctant to leave my room. The host is very responsive and extremely helpful. He even helped me to do my laundry (just one top) to remove the stains and refused to accept any payment. The minsu's "private parking" area was a huge plus!  Useful for those travelling with a lot of luggage and/or with a large family. 3-min walk to Jiu Fen Old Street (entrance is close to Ah Gan Taro Balls). No regrets spending four consecutive nights here. :D
Highly recommend! Nothing bad to say about this place. You will be blown away

description.access: We have a spacious front garden that allows guests to have a nice barbecue there. There is also a lobby and two public places respectively on the 2nd and 3rd floor that you use freely.
description.notes:
â˜Our minsu is close to the Wude Elementary school and is located in a residential district. We are close to the Shihli beach and Shanshuei beach. (within 8 mins by riding scooter.)
â˜There is NO room cleaning service during your staying (for over 2 nights), but please let us know if you really need it.
description.neighborhood: As you may know the "Twin Hearts Stone Weir" in Ci-mei, we have our own family "Stone Weir" that we can take you there to experience the ancestor's wisdom if you're interested in. Just please let us know in advance so that we can arrange our staff.

- No shoes in the room, and we'll prepare in-door slippers for you
- Please lower your voice after 10 p.m.

hosts.about: Born and raise in Taipei, Taiwan with nature influence with Chinese, Taiwanese and Japanese cultures. Love traveling and experiencing different customs and traditions. Interested in exploring historical spots connecting with historic events.

hosts.about:
Hi , I'm Joseph.
I like to find new things, meet people from different Countries,
Also feel free to chat with me about everything.
Nice to be here and meet you.

description.summary:
Seclusion is located in Wujie Township, Yilan County, about 3km from Luodong Transfer Station, It's about 5 mins drive from the National Freeway No.5 Loudong interchange, near the Art Center and Dongshan River Water park.
The painting of the wall represents the warmth of our welcome. The different design styles of each room and the furnishings are collected from all over the world.
description.space:
We offers:
Twin Size Bed *2
Queen Size Bed *1
King Size Bed  *2
TV  *5
Simple kitchen
Simmons bed kit
Evian bottle water 
Mini bar for free
Osme Cleansing kit
Shower room *5
Restroom *5
Balcony and Pool
Barbecue Tools(also offers material)

if you need anything which is not above, please do contact the housekeeper
description.access:
All facilities in the room are available.
Due to the knives and other tools may cause injured , Kitchen is not available.
description.notes:
The Countryside of Ilan is peace and silent.
Please be quiet after 22:30 to avoid bothering other customer.
And turn off the light before leaving.
Save the power, save the Earth.
description.neighborhood:
Wujie is still a village with a lot of agriculture, but at the same time has the convenience brought by the city.
Near Loudong, there are always a lot of scenery to see in the day or night.
Pine Park, Night Market, Forest Farm, and a variety of snacks.
Less than 4km away frome the hustle and bustle, quietly and relaxed on the sofa, enjoying the tranquility of the countryside.
Seclusion, waiting for you to explore, and also waiting for you to come back home...
description.transit:
Bus: 
You can take the bus below:
Capital Star 1570
MTC 9028
Kamalan 1917A
Kuo-Kuang Bus 1879
United Bus 1661
Depart at LuoDong Station, Take a taxi to No.111 Park 3rd road, the housekeeper will greet you at the front door

Drive: 
To the National Highway No. 5 Luodong Interchange (47K), take the ramp and drive forward to the revolving lane. Turn right  to Chuanyi Road and drive on the right lane. Turn right to Park Road at 7-11. Turn right at the first lane and continue straight. Right Turn Park 3rd to No. 111, the housekeeper will guide the parking at the door

Train:
Depart at LuoDong Station, Go th the Chuanyi Road exit. Take a taxi to No.111,Park 3rd,
the housekeeper will greet you  at the front door.
description.interaction:
Seclusion Check-in Time 11:00-15:00 (the accommodation environment and equipment usage)
Housekeeper will introduce the accommodation environment and equipment usage

description.summary:
Tranquil and greenery
Let your soul immersed in our home
Bath your body with HERMEÌ€S or Chatzutang
Breakfast next morning tickles your taste buds

One foot steps toward mountains and the other toward Sun Moon Lake.
Arts fulfills in meditation, feels here like your home.

Downshifting, balance your work and life,
What you need is all in Sun Moon Inn.
description.space:
Pursue the sun and the moon, Away from the crowd.
Time to stay in esthetic the Sun Moon Inn for one night.
Enjoy the walk before the sun rising, ripples spreads across the lake.
Walk into the deep of the forest, go up the peak and overlook the hillside.
The sun shine emerges into the eyes, cuddling me warmly and tenderly.

After lingering with Mother Nature, here Iâ€™m back, Sun Moon Inn.
Be built up with BeÌton brut, it stands out in the ordinary view.
Surrounded with green and blue , Slightly change your working mode into the good mood.

Tranquil and greenery
Let your soul immersed in our home
Bath your body with HERMEÌ€S or Chatzutang
Breakfast next morning tickles your taste buds

One foot steps toward mountains and the other toward Sun Moon Lake.
Arts fulfills in meditation, feels here like your home.

Downshifting, balance your work and life,
What you need is all in Sun Moon Inn.
description.access:
â—Â In order to maintain the quality of accommodation, please according to the number of people in the room type you choose when having check-in. Sorry for not accepting the request of unexpected additional guests on the spot. If necessary, please confirm the sum of people with us in advance:
ã€€â–ºÂ For zero-to-2-year-old children shall pay 200 NTD per person.Â 
ã€€â–ºÂ 3-6 years old children shall pay 400 NTD per person, including breakfast only.Â 
ã€€â–ºÂ over 7-years old children will be charged extra fee of 1,000 NTD, including breakfast and spares.
â—Â For special festivals and Chinese New Year, the principle of no additional guests-adding is required. If necessary, please confirm with the butler in advance.
â—Â We are worried about dust mites and do not use quilts that cannot be cleaned. We use water-washed quilts and wash them after each use to prevent allergies. If you need to add quilts, you must pay forÂ extraÂ quilt. The cleaning fee is 350Â TWD.Â Thank you for yourÂ understandingÂ our Inn's insistence on cleaning.
â—Â Sun Moon Inn is running the business as B&B ,Â not a hotel, therefore, there is no 24-hour counter service, check-in time is: 15:30~19:00, please contact us if you wish to check in other time.
â—Â Check-out time is 11Â a.m..Â A 30-minute late check-out will incur an additional charge of 250Â NTDÂ per 30 minutes.
â— Free parking is available from 15:30 p.m. to 11 a.m. the next day (Please inform us in advance) , if the parking time exceeds original range of time, you will be requested to pay extra parking fee to the parking manager.
â—Â Breakfast serving time is from 8 to 9:30, please enjoy the breakfast at 1st floor before 9:30.
â—Sun Moon Inn is located in the residential area, please lower the volume to keep the quality of the cozy stay. If noises bother other tourists and neighbors, we have the right to ask you to leave right away and wonâ€™t return any refund, please keep in mind and thank you for your cooperation.

Follow Sun Moon Inn's official FB and IG to get more Sun Moon Lake travel information!

description.neighborhood: The Sun Moon Lake, located in the middle of Taiwan, with an elevation of 748 meters above sea level, is the only natural big lake in Taiwan. The southern part of La Lu Island is shaped like a new moon, and the northern part is shaped like a sun; hence the name Sun Moon Lake.
description.transit:
Transporation by driving
(1)Driving from Taipei southwards
ã€€*Route A: Freeway No.3 â†’ Wufeng System Interchange (Freeway No.6) â†’ get off at Ailan Interchange (continue on via Tai-14th Highway to Puli) â†’ Puli (continue on Tai-21st Highway) â†’Yuchiâ†’ Sun Moon Lake Shuishe Visitor Center â†’ drive on and Sun Moon Inn is only a minute away
ã€€*Route B: Freeway No.1 â†’ at Changhua System Interchange, take Freeway No. 3 toward southâ†’ Wufeng System Interchange (Freeway No.6) â†’ get off at Ailan Interchange (continue on via Tai-14th Highway to Puli) â†’ Puli (continue on Tai-21st Highway) â†’Yuchiâ†’ Sun Moon Lake Shuishe Visitor Center â†’ drive on and Sun Moon Inn is only a minute away
ã€€*Route C: Freeway No.3 â†’ get off at Caotun Interchange and take Tai-14th Highway to Puli â†’ Puli (continue on Tai-21st Highway) â†’Yuchi â†’ Sun Moon Lake Shuishe Visitor Center â†’ drive on and Sun Moon Inn is only a minute away
(2)Driving from Taichung
ã€€*Route A: Taichung â†’Zhongtou Expressway â†’get off at Zhongtou Interchange and take Freeway No.3 â†’Wufeng System Interchange (Freeway No.6) â†’ get off at Ailan Interchange (continue on via Tai-14th Highway to Puli) â†’ Puli (continue on Tai-21st Highway) â†’Yuchiâ†’ Sun Moon Lake Shuishe Visitor Center â†’drive on and Sun Moon Inn is only a minute away
ã€€*Route B: Taichung â†’ Taichung Road â†’ Dali â†’ Guoguang Road â†’ Wufeng â†’Tai-14th Highway â†’ Caotun â†’Tai-14th Highway â†’ Puli â†’ Tai-21st Highway â†’Yuchiâ†’ Sun Moon Shuishe Visitor Centerâ†’ drive on and Sun Moon Inn is only a minute away
(3)Driving from Kaohsiung Northwards
ã€€*Route A: Freeway No.1â†’ Tai-78th Expresswayâ†’Freeway No.3 â†’ get off at Zhushan Interchange â†’ Jiji(continue on Tai-3rd Highway and then get on Tai-16th Highway) â†’Shuili (continue on Tai-16th Highway) â†’Sun Moon Lake (onto Tai-21st Highway).
ã€€*Route B: Freeway No.3â†’get off at Zhushan Interchangeâ†’ Jiji (continue on Tai-3rd Highway and then get on Tai-16th Highway) â†’Shuili (continue on to Tai-16th Highway)

Transporation by bus
ã€€*Take the Sun Moon Lake Line of Nantou Bus opposite Taichung Railway Station.
ã€€*At THSR Taichung Station, toward No.5 Exit at street level, you will find Taiwan Tourist Shuttle service. Take their Sun Moon Lake line and get off at Shueishe Visitor Center.
ã€€*Take Sun Moon Lake Line of Kuo-Kuang Motor Transportation at Taipei Railway Station.
ã€€*In a diagonal direction across from Kaohsiung Railway Station, take the Puli Line of Kuo-Kuang Motor Transportation or Ubus and transfer to Nantou Bus for Sun Moon Lake.
ã€€*Take the Sun Moon Lake Line of Taiwan Tourist Shuttle service at Taichung airport and get off at Shueishe Visitor Center.
ã€€*Walking form Shueishe Visitor Center to Sun Moon Inn only 3 minutes.

location.address: Banqiao District, New Taipei City, Taiwan

gallery.caption: How to get to my house from Taoyuan Airport Terminal2 station?

items.comments: Clean and convenient place.  Great value - Eric was very responsive with check in process.  Will stay again
Host wast welcoming and helpful. Encourages mingling between guests.
Hey guys, it's my second time to stay at Eric's house. Honestly it's truly clean and comfortable to stay for vacation or biz trip in Taipei. Highly recommended to all of the tourists!
Great stay, friendly host. Place had all amenities one would ever need: washing machine, dish washer and even free snacks

I'm very happy to have booked this Airbnb. The location was great, it's close to the MRT station (7 minute walk to the Bannan Line) so you can get anywhere in Taipei pretty easily and fairly quickly as well. There is also a night market right next to the airbnb if you want to check out some local food.
The room itself is well equipped and has everything you could need. I especially liked having the AC and the hot water dispenser to make instant noodles!

Eric himself was a great and very communicative host. He both helped me with the check in and also took the time to provide me with local  recommendations which I really appreciated. He was always kind in his responses and got back to me promptly when I had any questions. It's very clear that he wants you to have a good stay and if there are any issues, you can reach out to him anytime! 

when I'm back in taipei, I will definitely book again. thank you Eric! :)

Umma was very friendly and was a pleasure to be around. She cooked some amazing meals (definitely get the dinner she offers). She even gave us fresh passion fruit off their tree when we left!

The rooms are basic, but you have everything you need. The location is perfect to go explore Taroko Gorge.
Amazing hosts, provided great hospitality and local tips. Taroko national park just a 10 min drive away!

We can recommend most UmmaÂ´s homecooked food which was really original and special. You will never find food like this in a restaurant. Also to be highlighted is that Umma and her husband were always happy to gave us a lift to the station, which was really nice. We thought it a pity not to be able to talk much to both of them because of the language.

description.summary: Authentic Bed & Breakfast near Taroko Gorge, close to the mountains and the sea. We are a passionate Truku aboriginal family.  Easy to get to by train and near bus to the national park. We rent mountain bicycles, and can extra prepare you an authentic Truku meal.
description.space:
Our B&B is a warm and welcoming space, hand built by our family and representative of our aboriginal culture. And we'd love to share it with you!

We provide the following free of charge:
- FreeBreakfast included for all guests
- Free pick-up from Xincheng train station
- Recommendations for motorcycle rentals 
- Recommendations for hiking/trekking itineraries and other fun things to do near Taroko. 

We can provide the following for additional charge:
-Pick-up from Hualien train station
- Mountain bicycles, basic gear, map and transport to locations within Taroko National Park 
- Authentic aboriginal meals including do-it-yourself craft-making (with a 3 day notice)
- For Chinese speakers, we can give personal tours of Taroko gorge which include aboriginal outdoor activities (half and day trips available)

Special  services: Can add the extra the Mattress on floor for 2 person above.  If any special request and contact me.


Feel free to ask us questions about the area or local culture.
description.access:
*Free Car parking
* Big open space to chat and eat breakfast/meals
* Provide WI-FI
* The room supply only a small towel (hand towel)
* Supply train station pick-up service
description.notes:

items.comments: Wayne speaks very good English and was extremely helpful.   The room was clean and comfortable.

description.space:
Laurel Villa opened its doors in January 2004. Since then we've had the privilege of serving guests from all over the world and are grateful for all the support and encouragement we've received.

We strive to live in harmony with nature and hope our guest can experience it by providing the most natural and comfortable living environment along with fresh and healthy meals.

Take a break from your busy schedule, visit us on your next trip to Sun Moon Lake and allow us to be part of your experience. We hope you'll be able to find peace and tranquil during your stay with us.
description.notes: Should you require us to recommend a sightseeing itinerary of Sun Moon Lake, feel free to enquire with us upon your arrival. We are more than happy to provide an introduction of the area and will discuss a suitable sightseeing schedule based on your duration of stay, interests and current weather conditions (different guests will have a unique schedule tailored to their needs).
description.neighborhood:
Shopping, food, accommodation, transport, parking and some of the attractions at Sun Moon Lake are within walking distance from Laurel Villa. 

Information of the various attractions is also readily available. 

Laurel Villa is accessible by car, scooter or public transport. 

After arriving at Sun Moon Lake, the best way to enjoy the scenery is to take a leisure stroll along some of the footpaths. Other than admiring the view of lake and the central mountain ranges in Taiwan, you can also see Wunwu Temple, Lalu Island, Cihen Pagoda, Syuanzang Temple, Syuanguang Temple and Ita Thao.

Should you require further information on the attractions of Sun Moon Lake, we will be glad to help you in planning a customized itinerary to meet your preferences or time constraints.

- Places within 1~3 minute of walking -
Shueishe pier (Sun Moon Lake's main pier)
Shueishe Lakeside Trail
Meihe Gardens (Strategic location for panoramic sight of the lake)
Hanbhi Hiking Trail (The late President CKS's favourite pathway)
7-Eleven, Starbucks
Zhong Xin Road carpark

- Places within 5 minutes of walking -
Shueishe Visitors Center
Restaurant and eateries serving Chinese, Western and local cuisine
Bus stop for public buses (plying local routes and areas outside Sun Moon Lake) 
Gift shops, specialty shops, pharmacy, bike and scooters for rent

- Places within 10 minutes of walking -
Longfong Temple & Matchmaker
Wen Wan Resort, Lalu Hotel & Teacher's Hostel
Chaowu pier

- Places within 30 minutes of walking -
Shueishe Dam Lakeside Trail
Bamboo Rock Garden
Mt. Maolan Hiking Trail
description.interaction: Almost every morning where weather allows, we will lead guests to view Sun Moon Lake's sunrise, grand morning scenery and provide introduction. This early morning activity will be entirely different from the other day activities available, hence we strongly recommend this activity to personally experience and appreciate Sun Moon Lake!
description.house_rules:
When checking in, please present your identification for verification and registration.
After 20:00, please lower the volume and forbidden to maintain the quality of your stay.
According to the smoke prevention method, the hotel is completely non-smoking, including rooms, bathrooms and balconies.
Please don't bring any drugs and dangerous goods (including any prohibited goods). If you have any illegal behavior, we must call the police.
Please be informed that we do not accept pets. Do not bring mahjong.
The kitchen and bar are not open to the public. Please inform in advance if you have any additional needs.
Do not use dangerous goods such as gas stoves or induction cookers indoors. Please turn off the power and save water.
If there is a demand for parking, it can be parked at the rear of Zhongxing Public Car Park. Guests staying at the hotel can enjoy preferential parking rates.
Do not arbitrarily move indoors (such as a bed). When you leave the room, please lock the door with your hand. Please keep your valuables carefully. When you check out, please return the door card.

items.comments: I can very highly recommend this place. It's quiet and the rooms are clean. Also the host is super friendly and helpful.

Our stay couldnâ€™t be more perfect. The house, the atmosphere were both magical, and our hosts were really heartwarming. A little bubble in the Taiwanese jungle.

items.comments:
Our stay couldnâ€™t be more perfect. The house, the atmosphere were both magical, and our hosts were really heartwarming. A little bubble in the Taiwanese jungle.
Thank you for the delicious breakfast and diner ; exactly what you need before and after hiking.

Winston was a gracious host. He truly looked after us and made delicious meals for us. The tradition house that is quiet and isolated from the city. There arenâ€™t many restaurants nearby for lunch, so be sure to bring some up the mountain. You can do some pottery there if you stay a couple of days. There are also some nice walks nearby. The best way to get around would be by car/scooter. I would highly recommend if youâ€™re looking for a quiet and calm holiday.

Winston  goes above and beyond to make you feel at home.  He provided  hot breakfast and dinner for us each day. He gave us helpful information about things to do nearby.   We had a wonderful time exploring this beautiful  area of Taiwan.

description.summary: Bamboo House is a traditional southern Chinese courtyard house hidden in bamboo forests. With more than half of a century long history, the building was out of shape until recent years. The owner, Winston Lin returned to his home village and renovated the house he grew up in after his retirement. With careful repairing and construction, the house presents itself with traditional bamboo columns, hinoke beams, white stucco, and red bricks as well as modern floor heating, skylights and bathrooms.
description.space: On the hill behind the main house sit a wood burning kiln where visitors can learn pottery making. further up at the highest in the property, Tea Pavilion is the most tranquil corner where visitor can enjoy local tea and organic coffee with amazing views.
description.access: Main house, dining pavilion, wood burning kiln, tea pavilion, trails
description.neighborhood: scenery nearby: skyladder, bagua tea plantation, bamboo tunnel, wangyou forest, zinan temple
description.transit:
by car |
from formosan freeway, take exit- nanyun at 250k, turn left onto jishan road, turn right onto dinglin road (49/49-1), turn right at 11.7km and arrive.
 
by bus|
from TRA / THSR taichung station, take taichung bus #6188 to zhushan terminal, transfer to yuanlin bus #6724, get off at fuxingliao station, walk 400m toward south

recent.comments: It was amazing. Had a great view from the balcony. The host was very helpful. Location is a few steps from the family mart, so it is very convenient. Loved the place. Will stay again.

items.comments: It was amazing. Had a great view from the balcony. The host was very helpful. Location is a few steps from the family mart, so it is very convenient. Loved the place. Will stay again.

We had a relaxing three nights staying at this place. There are plenty of diners to choose from in Monster Village nearby. There can be some sounds outside at night due to the wild life but itâ€™s nature.  Appreciate the help and suggestions from the hosts.

items.comments:
The host family was super welcoming. Communication went smoothly even though we don't speak chinese. 
Room was small but clean with common bathroom. Both were clean and had everything we need. I would recommend to order the japanese style dinner. Was plenty and delicious. Thanks go to the cook.
Definitly would recommend as it is local and good spot to go for several hikes. Price okayish.

recent.comments:
Good location and convenience.
It is so close to go to the bus station.
Receptionist is so helpful and friendly.

items.comments:
Good location and convenience.
It is so close to go to the bus station.
Receptionist is so helpful and friendly.
The supper and breakfast was superb. Convenient location  and very near to the Main Street

This is a great place to stay at, it is very close to Jiufen's old street and the host was very helpful with things you could do and see and how to get there such as helping find Pingxi's night market and lanterns. 
The place is very comfortable and clean with all the required amenities available. The host also provided breakfast, Westerners should not expect a typical Western breakfast but I encourage you to try everything on the plate such as the egg pudding. If you find the breakfast too difficult to eat, the host also provides sandwiches which might be easier for you so do not be concerned.
One thing to note however, because the area is itself is difficult to navigate, it may be a bit difficult to find the place, however the host is very helpful with quick responses (Mandarin Chinese required). Because the area can be difficult to navigate, and as it is on a mountain, there are a lot of stairs in the area, if at all possible, avoid bringing large pieces of luggage to this stay. It is possible to get there with large luggage as I did during this stay especially since the host was able to give alternate routes, but it is more difficult than if you had smaller luggage. 
Overall a great place to stay with an incredibly helpful host.

description.summary:
Showcasing a sun terrace and views of the mountains, Pretty Sun B&B is located in Jian in the region of Hualien County, just 4 km from Hualien City. Guests can enjoy the on-site restaurant. Free WiFi is featured and free private parking is available on site.

Certain rooms feature a sitting area to relax in after a busy day. All rooms include a private bathroom. Extras include free toiletries and a hairdryer. A flat-screen TV is provided.
description.space: Through floor-to-ceiling glass windows and its private balcony, this room overlooks the mountains. Fitted with air conditioning, it also has a flat-screen TV,  and a private bathroom.

description.summary: Frog pool B & B situated in the middle of the rice farmland in Wujie Township Of Yilan County.  We look forward to meeting you! Feel free to ask anything during your stay.
description.space:
Froggy#4 Suite is A Unique Room 
Enough For 4 Persons With Separate Entrance And Private Bath And Balcony. The Room Also Provide Table, Desk Lamp, 
Sofa bed, Hair Dryer ,CD PLAEYR..
The Room includes:
*Real bed that fits 1 to 2 people comfortably. 
*Llinens and towels are provided for the guest
*private bathrooms with shower & bathtub
*Hair Shampoo, Shower Body Gel, Hair Dryer included
* Sanitary Accessories Provided. (Itâ€™s Better With Your Own Toothbrush.)
*Free wifi included
*Air conditioner And Heating
* No smoking completely Indoors. 

â€»Notice: refrigerator & kitchen provided in the 1st floor of main building.

Every guest can enjoy our handmade free breakfast. 
Additional hotel fees extra bed:NT$600/adult
Child without extra bed.NT$300/each 

Please keep your voices down after 11pm to enjoy calmly night.
description.access: Public space and kitchen on 2nd and 1st floor with front and back courtyard.
description.notes:
Family with senior member or limited mobility are recommended to lodge in froggy#3 or froggy#4. 

No TV is provided in all frog pool rooms. 

Frog pool is located in the middle of farmland without public transportation. We recommend you to take taxi and we can reserve a taxi for you.

Please take off your shoes indoors. 
We accept postpone or full refunds if have any natural disaster,(typhoon or serious earthquakeâ€¦) happens on the checking date based on official announcement.
Our check in time : 15:00-24:00 (drop bags earlier is ok) 
Check out time : 11:00 am
*Breakfast time is 8am or 9am by guest option, and no later than 10am. We also provide full vegetarian dishes
*Return keys upon check out and nt$150 fee for lost key,
*Free reading from bookstands and you can bring it back with listed book price if any stained or damaged.
description.neighborhood: You can catch broad view of blue sky, green mountains and harvest rice farmland from our front courtyard. We you can have a very restful and wonderful vacation.
description.transit:

by Public Bus
Taipei City Hall Stop To Use Capital Star BUS For ,TPE- Luodong Express( Bus1570) to Luodong Transfer Station (50 min. NT$ 128) Or

Then Rent scooter Or By Taxi To Frog pool(15 min. Around NT$ 200)

items.comments: Angline was a perfect host, and her homestay was a wonderful place to lay my head in Hualien. The space is very stylish, with lots of small touches (including her own lovely watercolor painting!), and the location is incredibly convenient. Lots of food and drink options within walking distance, and the garden makes the space feel much less urban than it actually is.

description.space:
The room can accomodate 2 people.

This house used to be a children clinic during the Japanese governance period 70 years ago. Every pieces in the house has its own story. After the renovation, the house retains the Japanese style architecture with a Japanese garden in the backyard area. This house is more than a place to stay as it brings old time memory to the neighbourhood.

Introduction of Hualien:
Hualien City (èŠ±è“®å¸‚) is the capital of Hualien County, Taiwan. It is located on the East coast of Taiwan, by the Pacific Ocean.

The climate is warm, bordering on humid subtropical and tropical rain forest. It is also not far from an monsoon climate.
Summer temperature: 25â€“32 Â°C (77â€“90 Â°F)
Winter temperature: 15â€“21 Â°C (59â€“70 Â°F)

In recent years, many farms and indigenous villages have transformed into tourist spots to let them to experience an organic lifestyle. Hualien has became more dynamic than ever and is sure to surprises you every time you visit.

description.summary: Frog pool B & B situated in the middle of the rice farmland in Wujie Township Of Yilan County.  We look forward to meeting you! Feel free to ask anything during your stay.
description.space:
Froggy#4 Suite is A Unique Room 
Enough For 4 Persons With Separate Entrance And Private Bath And Balcony. The Room Also Provide Table, Desk Lamp, 
Sofa bed, Hair Dryer ,CD PLAEYR..
The Room includes:
*Real bed that fits 1 to 2 people comfortably. 
*Llinens and towels are provided for the guest
*private bathrooms with shower & bathtub
*Hair Shampoo, Shower Body Gel, Hair Dryer included
* Sanitary Accessories Provided. (Itâ€™s Better With Your Own Toothbrush.)
*Free wifi included
*Air conditioner And Heating
* No smoking completely Indoors. 

â€»Notice: refrigerator & kitchen provided in the 1st floor of main building.

Every guest can enjoy our handmade free breakfast. 
Additional hotel fees extra bed:NT$600/adult
Child without extra bed.NT$300/each 

Please keep your voices down after 11pm to enjoy calmly night.

About Frog pool
The designer/artist who built this house based on his dreaming bookstore, for he had saw a Famous Painting calledâ€œfrog pool â€œby Claude Monet During His Designing progress then This Designer Used The Frog pool As His Blueprin and Hope To See Ample And Variety Of Colors Within This Area. Therefore We Have Grown Many Trees And Flowers At Random To Create No Messy Up Beautiful Nature Along With Piece By Piece Paintings By Colorful Mosaics Or Patched Pebbles When You Visit Frog pool Please Bring  A Carefree heart To Find Your Favorite Corner To Read, to Listen Music Or To Take A Free Bike Ride Around Wujie Townshipâ€™s Rustic Scenery. At Night, please Take A Satisfied Sleep Accompanied With The Frog croak  Then To Wake Up For A Delicious Homemade Brunch By Our Housekeeper.
description.access: Public space and kitchen on 2nd and 1st floor with front and back courtyard.
description.notes:
Family with senior member or limited mobility are recommended to lodge in froggy#3 or froggy#4. 

No TV is provided in all frog pool rooms. 

Frog pool is located in the middle of farmland without public transportation. We recommend you to take taxi and we can reserve a taxi for you.

Please take off your shoes indoors. 
We accept postpone or full refunds if have any natural disaster,(typhoon or serious earthquakeâ€¦) happens on the checking date based on official announcement.
Our check in time : 15:00-24:00 (drop bags earlier is ok) 
Check out time : 11:00 am
*Breakfast time is 8am or 9am by guest option, and no later than 10am. We also provide full vegetarian dishes
*Return keys upon check out and nt$150 fee for lost key,
*Free reading from bookstands and you can bring it back with listed book price if any stained or damaged.
description.neighborhood: You can catch broad view of blue sky, green mountains and harvest rice farmland from our front courtyard. We you can have a very restful and wonderful vacation.
description.transit:

Address: No.258, Jincao 1st Rd., Wujie Township, Yilan County 26842, Taiwan (R.O.C.) (left Hand Behind National Center for Traditional Arts)

title: Dongshan Township, Taiwan

hosts.about: I'm a master student who study in England this year :)
Hi! Welcome Taiwan. I am Ursa Lee. I likes to have new friends and try fresh things. Hope I can be a good host for you guys and I will do my best. Enjoy your trip, enjoy your life.
