items.comments:
å®‰éœ èˆ’é© å¥½åƒçš„ä¸‹åˆèŒ¶ å’Œå¯ä»¥åƒå¾—é£½çš„æ—©é¤
æˆ¿é–“å¾ˆä¹¾æ·¨ å€¼å¾—æ¨è–¦!

Our daughter is just 18-month old. The host is so considerate that we can have fresh food without any seasoning for our daughter throughout our stay at Yilan. The food is so delicious that my daughter even finishes a big piece of Salmon by herself !! 

The bnb is just 11min drive from Lo Dong station, it's pretty convenient.

Would highly recommend this to families with toddlers. Will surely come again later!!

This house is builded with love and passion by a lovely family who takes a lot efforts on providing great accommodation and healthy food to guests. The room is just as you see in the picture and description, clean, neat, with everything you needed. The complimentary afternoon tea set was pretty good with delicious cakes and cookies. The coffee is not hot enough tho, that's the only pity we had. The place is easy to find, with plenty parking space, and a spacious garden that you can relax while arrival. Room to improve : the soundproof can be better, and the french windows make guests easy to be seen by people who stand on the balcony next door, can be an issue for privacy-sensitive guests.

Excellent stay here. It fulfilled what we have dreamed for an ideal relaxing vacation in every aspect!

Accommodation: Bed was super comfortable and soft. The host provided us extra pillow if you like the pillow harder. The surrounding was splendid and photogenic. You can see mountains with great farm landscape. Room is super clean and spacious. Every room has a projector that amazed us. 

Food: healthy and delicious food! Portion is just enough for breakfast. Afternoon tea was tasty for people who are not sweat tooth, you'll still enjoy it.

Service: Ursa is super friendly and engaging. He shared about the story of why starting this host and really wanted to help the local communities to thrive by unique experiences b&b could provide.


If you are looking for a place to loose your tension. This is the exact place to do so with great value of money. We had a remarkable experience here and I'm sure that you will love it once you've stayed.

description.summary:
VILLA LOHERB is located in DongShang township. Build in 2015, right on peaceful rice field surround by magnificent mountains, it is Loft green architecture style, offers modern and top-quality design, here in these charming and stylish surroundings.
There are free bicycles available for ride into the rice fields and to the areas nearby. You can enjoy walking, biking, eating and staying like local people do is one of the best ways to experience the essence of Taiwan.
description.space:
Featured in allÂ types rooms in VILLA LOHERB.
1.Private Balcony & Sky Lounge: 
Every room comes along with private balcony and sky lounge, which is the perfect place to enjoy VILLA LOHERBâ€™s spectacular sunsets view of DongShang township.
2. Flora Theme:
IndividuallyÂ themed rooms decorate with different flora, which makes each room so different.
3.Panorama view: 
Floor-to-ceiling glass windows flooding the entire width of the room with light and offering uninterrupted views of DongShang township. 
4.Top bedding: 
use king size independent cylinder bed and down comfort. 
5.Top electrical equipment: 
90-inch Projection Screen, kettle, refrigerator, hair dryer, universal plug, free wifi. 
6.Top bath equipment: TOTO bath and washlet. 
7.Natural spare: 
We provide hot spring powder, body wash, shampoo, soap, towels, toothbrush. 
8. Healthy breakfast and afternoon tea: 
Besides healthy breakfast and afternoon tea, we also provide LOHERB yogurt Probiotics, tea bags, coffee bags.

description.neighborhood: VILLA LOHERB is located besides Dongshan River Park, near the starting of the central mountain. You can enjoy the water and mountain landscape at the same time. Brown Avenue and 52Jia wetland are closed to VILLA LOHERB, too. You can enjoy the endless rice fields and see birds with rich biodiversity here. If you want to go to famous international attractions, it only takes 10 mins to Ecoark or Traditional Arts by car.
description.transit:
If you go to VILLA LOHERB by driving, please go along the 5th National Road to the Luodong exit. Go straight on 191, then turn left to Xie Song Road, turn left to Baofu Road. VILLA LOHERB is just here.
If you go to VILLA LOHERB by public transportation, you can take train or bus to Luodong station, and then take the taxi about 10 minutes to arrive.
description.interaction: In VILLA LOHERB, you can experience local special activities like. 1.Lohas farm: you can experience grow plants with natural agricultural and friendly farming way here. 2.Handmade stuff: plant herb pot and make biscuits. 3.Health housekeeper: nutritionist can help you enjoy health life style and self-health management. 4.Bike trip: ride free bikes with hand-painted map to find sightseeing place here. 5.Festivals: Green Expo will be in spring, childrenâ€™s folklore festival will be in summer, different season, special festival activities.

hosts.about:
We are a young couple who love to travel and meet friends from all over the world. We are open to different cultures, and lifestyles, and passionate about decorating beauty elements into our homes to provide a better living space for guests.

Both Mini 1/2/3 have been designed with much thought, and we hope you, as our guests, can enjoy and take care of them.

name: Mocean   Close to Wushi Harbor Waiao Beach
title: Toucheng Township, Taiwan

description.summary: A new experience of serviced apartments, overlooking the sea view of Guishan Island,an infinity swimming pool, sky garden,  sofa area.Close to Wushi Port,most famous surfing area,we provide surfboard racks, and outdoor washing areas for friends who come back from the each.Stay in Yilan! Lie down and watch the mountains and the sea.
description.space: Near Wushi Port and Waiao Beach, infinity pool, roof garden, Wangguishan Island, karaoke, gym, outdoor BBQ
description.access:
Room space
Standard single bed
Standard double bed
Free wifi

_public Utilities
1. Please take the elevator to the roof garden and view the mountains and the sea to the R building, which is open until 9 pm.
2. The infinity pool is open from June 2nd to October 31st (must wear a swimsuit and swimming cap to enter the pool)
Opening hours 9:00ï½19:00
3. If you need to use the gym, karaoke, chess and card room, and pool court, please make an appointment with the landlord.
3. The facilities in the public space are not open every Monday.
4. To rent a bicycle, you need to go to the counter to change the certificate and register.
5. The public washing machine/dryer is located on the 2nd floor of the basement. Coin-operated type requires your own change and is open 24 hours a day.
6.Serving breakfast.
description.notes:
To maintain the quality of the room, do not smoke and bring pets.
Do not disturb other residents, please pay attention to the volume after ten o'clock in the evening.
We provide a comfortable environment for our guests to stay. We cannot provide the services like a five-star hotel. Sorry for the inconvenience caused.
description.neighborhood: Get close to nature, face the mountains and the sea.
description.transit: Underground parking lot is the most convenient for driving. Bicycles can also be rented

items.comments: Great stay, super nice, good food, relaxing location and space!

description.summary: Frog pool B & B situated in the middle of the rice farmland in Wujie Township Of Yilan County.  We look forward to meeting you! Feel free to ask anything during your stay.
description.space:
Froggy#2 room is on The  2ND FL of this main building with air-conditioner and heating, lamp and armchair.
The room includes:
*Real bed that fits 1 to 2 people comfortably. 
*Linens and towels are provided for the guest
*Hair shampoo, shower body gel, hair dryer included
* Sanitary accessories provided. (itâ€™s better with your own toothbrush.)
*Free wifi included
* No smoking completely Indoors. 
*Free Bike

â€»Notice:Bath , refrigerator & kitchen is on the 1st floor. 
Person who need accompany and senior family member is recommended to lodge in froggy#3 or froggy#4. 

Every guest can enjoy our handmade free breakfast. 
Additional hotel fees extra bed:NT$600/adult
Child without extra bed.NT$300/each

Please keep your voices down after 11pm to enjoy calmly night.

About Frog pool
The designer/artist who built this house based on his dreaming bookstore, for he had saw a Famous Painting calledâ€œfrog pool â€œby Claude Monet During His Designing progress then This Designer Used The Frog pool As His Blueprin and Hope To See Ample And Variety Of Colors Within This Area. Therefore We Have Grown Many Trees And Flowers At Random To Create No Messy Up Beautiful Nature Along With Piece By Piece Paintings By Colorful Mosaics Or Patched Pebbles When You Visit Frog pool Please Bring  A Carefree heart To Find Your Favorite Corner To Read, to Listen Music Or To Take A Free Bike Ride Around Wujie Townshipâ€™s Rustic Scenery. At Night, please Take A Satisfied Sleep Accompanied With The Frog croak  Then To Wake Up For A Delicious Homemade Brunch By Our Housekeeper.
description.access: Public space and kitchen on 2nd and 1st floor with front and back courtyard.
description.notes:
Family with senior member or limited mobility are recommended to lodge in froggy#3 or froggy#4. 

No TV is provided in all frog pool rooms. 

Frog pool is located in the middle of farmland without public transportation. We recommend you to take taxi and we can reserve a taxi for you.

Please take off your shoes indoors. 
We accept postpone or full refunds if have any natural disaster,(typhoon or serious earthquakeâ€¦) happens on the checking date based on official announcement.
Our check in time : 15:00-24:00 (drop bags earlier is ok) 
Check out time : 11:00 am
*Breakfast time is 8am or 9am by guest option, and no later than 10am. We also provide full vegetarian dishes
*Return keys upon check out and nt$150 fee for lost key,
*Free reading from bookstands and you can bring it back with listed book price if any stained or damaged.
description.neighborhood: You can catch broad view of blue sky, green mountains and harvest rice farmland from our front courtyard. We you can have a very restful and wonderful vacation.
description.transit:
Transportation Methods
Address: No.258, Jincao 1st  Rd., Wujie Township, Yilan County 26842, Taiwan (R.O.C.) (left Hand Behind National Center for Traditional Arts)
Self Driving Cars .pls Use (SENSITIVE CONTENTS HIDDEN) Map Search â€˜è›™å¡˜æ°‘å®¿â€™ 

Public transport : 

# From Taoyuan International Airport 
1.Use Charted Taxi : we Can Assist To Contact Taxi Service
2.public Bus To Taipai Main Station - Express Kamalan Bus To Luodong Transfer Station  Rent scooter Or By Taxi To Frogpool
# From Taipei
by Public Bus
Taipei City Hall Stop To Use Capital Star BUS For ,TPE- Luodong Express( Bus1570) to Luodong Transfer Station (50 min. NT$ 128) Or 
Taipei Transfer Station To Take Kamalan BUS TPE- Luodong ( Bus1917) To Luodong Transfer Station(60 min. NT$ 141) 
Then Rent scooter Or By Taxi To Frog pool(15 min. Around NT$ 200)

By Train 
To Luodong Train Station Rent scooter Or By Taxi To Frog pool(15 min. Around NT$ 200)

Frog pool is located in the middle of farmland without public transportation. We recommend you to take taxi and we can reserve a taxi for you.
description.interaction: You Can Enjoy Your Privacy Completely and a 24Hrs Housekeeper Standing By at Frog pool.

Lovely place, make us feel like home! The location is approx 8mins walk from the train station! Love it, will stay again if I come hualien next time :D

description.summary:
With 2 bedrooms/ 1 living room/ 1 bathroom and 1 mini kitchen. We take only one set of guests at a time. You will have exclusive use of all the space. Perfect for family, friends, and couples. Accommodate up to 4 people. 

IMPORTANTï¼šbooking before Nov 23, 2019, 2 guests used 2 bedrooms will be charged $300NTD when you check in. And it's new price after Nov 23, no need to extra pay when used 2 bedrooms.
description.space:
The apartment is on the second floor(no elevator). Itâ€™s close to Hualien station with convenient stores, cafes, restaurants, laundry, gym, cinema and bowling place in walking distance.

Convenient location:
*Hualien station: 7 mins by walk/ 3 mins by car.
*Downtown Hualien: 5 mins by car.
*Dongdamen night market: 6 mins by car.
*Qixingtan beach. 13 mins by car.
*Farglory ocean park: 20 mins by car.
*Taroko national park: 30 mins by car.

Spacious living room with TV and wifi. The rooms are bright and tidy. Each room is equipped with A/C. Both rooms come with a full bed for two, comfy pillows and bed sheets. You will also find fresh towels, body wash, shampoo in the bathroom. Please bring your own toothbrush and toothpaste. Mini kitchen with fridge and plates, bowls, mugs, etc.

Free essential toiletries are available in the bathroom. Bed sheets and towels are changed between every guest. Well-suited for happy travellers who want quality accommodation, local tips, and an awesome location!
description.access: Living room, mini kitchen, 2 bedrooms and Free WiFi
description.notes:
You will be given the apartment key upon check in. Please beware we have neighbors so keep the noise level down after 9p.m.

Check in 15:00 / Check out 11:00
description.transit: Car/ scooter rentals and bus station are right in front of the train station (All are within five minutes walk from the apartment). You need to park your car on the street and we offer parking for scooters.
description.interaction: If you need some recommendation on what to do in Hualien, I will give you my advice to the best knowledge. Also, if you have any questions during your stay, feel free to contact me anytime.

items.comments: Really nice place to stay. Felt comfortable and welcome as if I were staying at a good friend's house.

hosts.about:
5 things we can't live without? 
warmth 
water 
movement 
stillness 
love

I particularly like being on Airbnb, I love to see people enjoying the space of my place. it's quite different. and when no-one is there, I love nurturing it, theres something about nurturing something that brings out the best in everyone.

it gives me the opportunity to create an environment that serves, gives people a little taste of heart, something more natural in the heart of the city.

I hope you will enjoy staying and thank you in advance for givng me the opportunity to contribute to help making your stay awesome. 

The world is giant playground, better play in it!

recent.comments: Amanda was extremely helpful and responsive! There was a typhoon on the day I was supposed to land and she checked in with me to make sure my flight would depart on time, and provided advice to prepare rain gear and to bring some snacks in case there was heavy rain and restaurants were closed. The place was so cozy and I felt right at home! Amenities were perfect for my 10 day stay, which included an electric stove, microwave, washing machine, hairdryer, plenty of extra towels and more than enough tissue and umbrellas. Super responsive during my stay too. When I couldn't work out the washing machine she came over to test it on the same day and gave clear step-by-step instructions with photos. The location is close to many restaurants and shops and a 3-minute walk away from the MRT station! The place had a receptionist during the day and needed a security fob to enter the building and use the elevator so it was very safe to stay there. Was a pleasant experience -- will be back for sure!

Your reservation guest count should be booked as the total guest(s), including all children, and any possible overnight guests. Any overnight stay of an affiliated guest will be considered as an additional guest during your stay, and should not exceed our stated limitation as it is strictly prohibited. An honor system is exercised on your end, or there will be a deduction from your security deposit as an additional guest fee for your entire stay.

--Check In and Check Out--
Check in after 16:00
Check out before 11:00, noon.

--Green-- 
Please turn off all lights and air-conditioner(AC) upon exiting the unit at all times. Any excessive use of electricity will be deducted from your security deposit at USD$10 per night during your entire stay.

--Common Courtesy-- 
Our property is located in a residential-only community, hence please lower your voice while in common spaces, such as the lobby, hallway and etc. No illegal and disruptive behaviors are permitted. Any complaints will result in immediate nonrefundable eviction.

--Non Smoking-- 
Our home is non-smoking. There is an outdoor patio onsite, so please smoke outside with the door closed. Any indoor smoking will be heavily penalized.

--Refundable Security Deposit--
Security deposit is collected on your credit card via Airbnb as a reserved amount, not charged. It is collected 24 hours before your check in, and it is fully refundable at guests' check-out after the apartment is returned in its original condition and when our house rules are abided.

description.summary:
~Check In -3pm~6pm,No serving after 6
*Private Sea View House with Bathroom & Terrace
*7~10 Minutes Walking Distance to JiuFen Old Street
*5 Minutes Walking Distance to DaGanLin Bus Station(å¤§ç«¿æ—ç«™)
*Free Minibar in the Room 
*Free Breakfast at 9am
description.space: Our double room is a duplex house,1st floor is the living room,bathroom and outside with the terrace. 2nd floor is the sleeping bed and a window and desk next to it. We also have Quadruple, if you need can contact us as well.
description.access: Each room with a mini bar station and private terrace to enjoy the view of the mountain & sea of Jiufen.
description.notes:
1.Due to many stairs in JiuFen, we recommend you to keep your big luggage in the train station.
2.Please inform us your arrival time, if we have free time may pick you up in the train station.
3. Breakfast will be delivered to your room around 9am, if you planed to leave earlier, please let us know in advance in order to prefer 
bread for you first in the room.
description.neighborhood:
This area is a very traditional & quiet community
Only a 7-minute walk to JiuFen Old Street.
description.transit: Bus Station is just under the community. 3 minutes walk from the house to the station, you can take it to train station, Golden Museum.
description.interaction: Due to each room with it's own entrance, we are not able to have many interaction with you. But the other hand, you have your private space and a quiet room.
description.house_rules:
1.Please keep quite at night and love & enjoy here like your own house.
2.All Pets are not allowed to stay in the house.
3.All rooms are Non Smoking Room.

items.comments: The room looks cozy and comfy, kindly served with welcome snacks. The location is very convenient as it is near to the Keelung Night Market. The room is surprisingly quiet. It was a great experience and I will definitely revisit it again if I go to Keelung in the future!
It is a very cute and cozy place. It is close to the night market. Additionally, there is a washer and dryer, which is a plus. I would stay there again.

description.summary: "Enzo House" is a 5-storey Baroque building built by the Ye family in 1953, next to the Keelung DianJi Temple. It was later taken over by Doctor Xu as a personal home and clinic. Our team has recently restored the building, including cleaning the stairs, reusing cypress interiors, and preserving original lighting fixtures and furniture for a historic stayÂ experience.
description.space: Experience the perfect blend of nostalgia and modern comfort at our recently renovated and restored home in KeeLung. After 2 years of meticulous work, we're excited to welcome you to our newly remodeled space, complete with all the amenities you need while preserving the character and charm of the originalÂ oldÂ house.
description.access: Our rooms offer the perfect combination of privacy and modern amenities, including attached bathrooms. Guests can also enjoy access to our shared spaces on the second floor, including a fully-equipped kitchen and dining area for a comfortableÂ stay.

description.transit:
Parking
The nearest parking is the next-door basement parking. (Private)

Public parking available at Boai Market B1 (5 minutes walk), Ren Ai Elementary school  (5 minutes walk)  and  Keelung E Square Mall (7 minutes walk). Sometimes, there are parking spaces by the roadside in our location.

Distance to various destinations.
Keelung port 600m/9mins
Keelung bus station 850m/12mins
Keelung train station 900m/13mins
Maritime Museum, Wang You valley, Chaojing Park 15-20 mins  / car ride
Jiufen,  Jinguashi, Shifen old street 30 mins / car ride
Taipei city 50 mins / car ride
description.house_rules:
Dear Guest

Welcome to Enzo House
In order to ensure the safety and personal privacy during your stay, please read this notice in detail. 
Thank you for your cooperation and we wish you have a pleasant stay with us. 

1.
Check-in time 3:00 am
Check-out time before 11:00 am
An overtime charge of NT$200/hr will be charged. 
2.
Do remember your room number and memorize the emergency escape route and the location of the fire extinguisher to ensure immediate response in the event of an emergency
3.
Do not jump or climb on railings when taking an elevator or going up and down stairs
4.
After 10:00 pm, please lower the volume and refrain from making loud noises.
5.
According to the Smoking Hazard Prevention Act, smoking is strictly prohibited in this building. We will charge a fee of NT$2000 to clean the room. 
6.
Do not use any stoves or heater to dry clothes, to prevent fire hazard. Dryer is available in our common area.
7.
Do not drink excessive alcohol, take drugs, or gamble in the guest room. Do not bring any dangerous or prohibited items.
8.
Please do not damage the equipment in the room, and do not take out the items in the room. If you cause any damage to the room during your stay, a fee will be charged according to the degree of damage.
9.
The luggage storage is a free service, which is only for storage and is not responsible for safekeeping. 
The luggage Storage is not liable for any damage and/or natural deterioration of luggage or of personal items stored.
The luggage Storage is not liable in any capacity for damage or loss due to unforeseeable events, force majeure and/or natural occurrences.
Perishable and dangerous are prohibited. Do bring your valuables and important documents with you at all times.
10.
Note to long-term renters

Except for Wednesday and Sunday, there will be garbage trucks parked opposite at 1450hrs and 2050hrs
Please dispose of the garbage by yourself. The garbage bags are available in the locker.

The laundry fee for pillow cases, bed covers, duvet covers (excluding towels). 
There is a service fee of NT$200, If you need our staff to change it for you

recent.comments: This was one of our favorite stays during our honeymoon in Taiwan. Not only are the cabins beautifully built with a lot of thought and love put into them, but the hosts are lovely and so welcoming. And the food for breakfast and the optional dinners is absolutely incredible. They were even so accommodating to swap out some pork dishes to other meats since I do not eat pork. We loved every moment of our stay and wish we could stay longer. Hope to be back soon!

items.comments: This was one of our favorite stays during our honeymoon in Taiwan. Not only are the cabins beautifully built with a lot of thought and love put into them, but the hosts are lovely and so welcoming. And the food for breakfast and the optional dinners is absolutely incredible. They were even so accommodating to swap out some pork dishes to other meats since I do not eat pork. We loved every moment of our stay and wish we could stay longer. Hope to be back soon!

A wonderful spot near sun moon lake. We had a romantic few days and this spot was a great location to enjoy peaceful evenings away from tourist traps. The dinners (reservation only) were delicious, and I loved the inclusive breakfasts. The family hosting both the bnb and the restaurant are very warm and welcoming. The bathtub is huge and the view is spectacular. We will definitely be coming back!

hosts.about:
My wife Mamiko, a former  ice hockey coach from Japan, and I manage this B&B together. Both of us went to school in Montana, USA.  In our school life, we had road trips really often. Sometimes, we just grabbed few t-shirts and jumped on our car ; then, headed to somewhere without a specfic plan.

Me, Jackie, love backpacking. I have been travelling to many countries. My wife has had many ice hockey tours around some countries where people are crazy for that sports.Now, our future travel plan is to backpack around all the counties in Taiwan and Japan.

We live with parents and dogs in this B&B. Wish you will visit us soon.

recent.comments:
Jackie and Mamiko were the most chilled-out hosts, and responded very quickly every time I contacted them. In person, they were friendly and attentive. I found staying at their place extra relaxing because of their great service! 
The place itself is in the most beautiful location, which was exactly what you can see in the pictures. In my opinion the price was great value, and I found my room very comfortable. Overall, a great location if you are looking for somewhere to appreciate Hualienâ€™s natural beauty whilst also not being too far from the city. Highly recommend!

location.address: Ruifang District, New Taipei City, Taiwan

recent.comments:
The place is VERY clean, housekeeper/owners VERY thoughtful and pleasant! High bank for the buck, will recommend especially for light packers. 

Some pointers to note
-Place is quite high up so for travellers w mega luggage beware - we followed the comprehensive directive video owner sent and managed to push our 23kg luggage up the long route in 30mins. Else you can opt to take a cab up. We took a cab down to Ruifang Police Station for 270 NT (SGD12) that housekeeper kindly helped us booked 
-There is free washing machine you can use here but no dryer so up to your preferences
-Tends to rain alot here so do check the weather forecast and bring umbrella/poncho
-We went for the NIGHT TOUR which is a definite recommendation: gave more meaning and life to what 9 Fen came to be. 
-Note that MOST stalls on 9fen old street closes before 7pm so if you need food, please do so earlier... Else you can always walk to the 7-11 (no seats) and or family mart (have seats)

It was our bad for not researching properly. Jiufen is super hill-ly so most of the Airbnbs/Hotels, you gotta hike abit up, so it is not super convenient for large luggages! Even though itâ€™s <10mins walk to Jiufen old street but do expect many stairs! 

Nevertheless, our host was super prompt to replies and friendly.  Our Airbnb was true to picture! Very lovely themed room. Outside the room there was brochure to introduce the famous stores of Jiufen. There was hot water for refill as well as free charging ports. And what we loved the most was shoe warmers haha! Jiufen is known to be rainy. Anyway my advice is to pack light when going to Jiufen! Airbnb wise was great~

description.summary: "Enzo House" is a 5-storey Baroque building built by the Ye family in 1953, next to the Keelung DianJi Temple. It was later taken over by Doctor Xu as a personal home and clinic. Our team has recently restored the building, including cleaning the stairs, reusing cypress interiors, and preserving original lighting fixtures and furniture for a historic stayÂ experience.
description.space: Experience the perfect blend of nostalgia and modern comfort at our recently renovated and restored home in KeeLung. After 2 years of meticulous work, we're excited to welcome you to our newly remodeled space, complete with all the amenities you need while preserving the character and charm of the originalÂ oldÂ house.
description.access: Our rooms offer the perfect combination of privacy and modern amenities, including attached bathrooms. Guests can also enjoy access to our shared spaces on the second floor, including a fully-equipped kitchen and dining area for a comfortableÂ stay.

description.transit:
Parking
The nearest parking is the next-door basement parking. (Private)

Public parking available at Boai Market B1 (5 minutes walk), Ren Ai Elementary school  (5 minutes walk)  and  Keelung E Square Mall (7 minutes walk). Sometimes, there are parking spaces by the roadside in our location.

Distance to various destinations.
Keelung port 600m/9mins
Keelung bus station 850m/12mins
Keelung train station 900m/13mins
Maritime Museum, Wang You valley, Chaojing Park 15-20 mins  / car ride
Jiufen,  Jinguashi, Shifen old street 30 mins / car ride
Taipei city 50 mins / car ride
description.house_rules:
Dear Guest

Welcome to Enzo House
In order to ensure the safety and personal privacy during your stay, please read this notice in detail. 
Thank you for your cooperation and we wish you have a pleasant stay with us. 

1.
Check-in time 3:00 am
Check-out time before 11:00 am
An overtime charge of NT$200/hr will be charged. 
2.
Do remember your room number and memorize the emergency escape route and the location of the fire extinguisher to ensure immediate response in the event of an emergency
3.
Do not jump or climb on railings when taking an elevator or going up and down stairs
4.
After 10:00 pm, please lower the volume and refrain from making loud noises.
5.
According to the Smoking Hazard Prevention Act, smoking is strictly prohibited in this building. We will charge a fee of NT$2000 to clean the room. 
6.
Do not use any stoves or heater to dry clothes, to prevent fire hazard. Dryer is available in our common area.
7.
Do not drink excessive alcohol, take drugs, or gamble in the guest room. Do not bring any dangerous or prohibited items.
8.
Please do not damage the equipment in the room, and do not take out the items in the room. If you cause any damage to the room during your stay, a fee will be charged according to the degree of damage.
9. 
The luggage storage is a free service, which is only for storage and is not responsible for safekeeping. 
The luggage Storage is not liable for any damage and/or natural deterioration of luggage or of personal items stored.
The luggage Storage is not liable in any capacity for damage or loss due to unforeseeable events, force majeure and/or natural occurrences.
Perishable and dangerous are prohibited. Do bring your valuables and important documents with you at all times.

10.
Note to long-term renters

Except for Wednesday and Sunday, there will be garbage trucks parked opposite at 1450hrs and 2050hrs
Please dispose of the garbage by yourself. The garbage bags are available in the locker.

The laundry fee for pillow cases, bed covers, duvet covers (excluding towels). 
There is a service fee of NT$200, If you need our staff to change it for you

items.comments: So glad we chose this place away from the busier side of the lake. Slept so soundly in the quiet and spacious room. Huge bathtub and beautiful views all around. Dinner (by reservation) and breakfast were great and made it so much more convenient to stay there.

I was a little worried about creepy crawlies coming into the cabin, but I think because it was wintertime there weren't so many. We booked to have dinner there the first night and man was it good! Totally worth it and breakfast is included too! It is right in the middle of nature so it means absolute silence at night. The cabins are really spacious, definitely enough for 4 people or a family, we were only two and had a blast. Also, everyone was so friendly. Do stay here, I absolutely recommend it.

description.summary: The lovely Scandinavian design with a welcoming glow and a humorous edge in Sommer 19. Our house which is located on a quiet street, just only takes eight mins by car to the downtown. You can both enjoy city life and experience countryside.
description.space:
The house include four bedrooms and five sets of bathrooms which are two double rooms and two quad rooms. One room is on the ground floor and the others are on the second floor which are twelve beds in total. We provide cozy and lovely private bedrooms, shared kitchen and living room. All the design made by ourself, the delicate furnishing, wallpaper and decoration in order to give you the unforgettable experience of staying.
Line & (SENSITIVE CONTENTS HIDDEN) ID:sommer19
description.access: Can enjoy the day relaxing in the living room or cooking in the kitchen. We provide bikes for the room guests.

description.summary: "Enzo House" is a 5-storey Baroque building built by the Ye family in 1953, next to the Keelung DianJi Temple. It was later taken over by Doctor Xu as a personal home and clinic. Our team has recently restored the building, including cleaning the stairs, reusing cypress interiors, and preserving original lighting fixtures and furniture for a historic stayÂ experience.
description.space: Experience the perfect blend of nostalgia and modern comfort at our recently renovated and restored home in KeeLung. After 2 years of meticulous work, we're excited to welcome you to our newly remodeled space, complete with all the amenities you need while preserving the character and charm of the originalÂ oldÂ house.
description.access: Our rooms offer the perfect combination of privacy and modern amenities, including attached bathrooms. Guests can also enjoy access to our shared spaces on the second floor, including a fully-equipped kitchen and dining area for a comfortableÂ stay.

Parking
The nearest parking is the next-door basement parking. (Private)

Public parking available at Boai Market B1 (5 minutes walk), Ren Ai Elementary school  (5 minutes walk)  and  Keelung E Square Mall (7 minutes walk). Sometimes, there are parking spaces by the roadside in our location.

description.house_rules:
Dear Guest

Welcome to Enzo House
In order to ensure the safety and personal privacy during your stay, please read this notice in detail. 
Thank you for your cooperation and we wish you have a pleasant stay with us. 

1.
Check-in time 3:00 am
Check-out time before 11:00 am
An overtime charge of NT$200/hr will be charged. 
2.
Do remember your room number and memorize the emergency escape route and the location of the fire extinguisher to ensure immediate response in the event of an emergency
3.
Do not jump or climb on railings when taking an elevator or going up and down stairs
4.
After 10:00 pm, please lower the volume and refrain from making loud noises.
5.
According to the Smoking Hazard Prevention Act, smoking is strictly prohibited in this building. We will charge a fee of NT$2000 to clean the room. 
6.
Do not use any stoves or heater to dry clothes, to prevent fire hazard. Dryer is available in our common area.
7.
Do not drink excessive alcohol, take drugs, or gamble in the guest room. Do not bring any dangerous or prohibited items.
8.
Please do not destroy the equipment in the room, and do not take out the items in the room. If you cause any damage to the room during your stay, a fee will be charged according to the degree of damage.
9. 
The luggage storage is a free service, which is only for storage and is not responsible for safekeeping. 
The luggage Storage is not liable for any damage and/or natural deterioration of luggage or of personal items stored.
The luggage Storage is not liable in any capacity for damage or loss due to unforeseeable events, force majeure and/or natural occurrences.
Perishable and dangerous are prohibited. Do bring your valuables and important documents with you at all times.
10.
Note to long-term renters

Except for Wednesday and Sunday, there will be garbage trucks parked opposite at 1450hrs and 2050hrs
Please dispose of the garbage by yourself. The garbage bags are available in the locker.

The laundry fee for pillow cases, bed covers, duvet covers (excluding towels). 
There is a service fee of NT$200, If you need our staff to change it for you

recent.comments: really convenient with a bus stop right outside the accommodation, place was also cozy and nice! very clean and comfy :-) didnâ€™t get to meet david but his parents were superb hosts too. they offered us tea and pumpkin seeds the moment we arrived, gave us tips on our itinerary, and cooked a delicious breakfast spread. would highly recommend this place!!

items.comments: really convenient with a bus stop right outside the accommodation, place was also cozy and nice! very clean and comfy :-) didnâ€™t get to meet david but his parents were superb hosts too. they offered us tea and pumpkin seeds the moment we arrived, gave us tips on our itinerary, and cooked a delicious breakfast spread. would highly recommend this place!!

The house is in the mid mountain range. Very peaceful and quiet. A short walk to hike up to a sunset viewpoint. There is a 24hr mini mart 3 mins walk away. The bus stop is right outside the door step. Davidâ€™s parents are great! Super friendly and gave lots of suggestions and information on what we can do around the area. Their home cook breakfast was awesome too. â¤ï¸ we had a great time. Thank you!

David's house I conveniently located near the bus stop and with a very near convenience store which makes everything within reach. Liu Ah Yi is hospitable and cooks delicious hometown dishes for us. David's house also recommended drivers who can bring us from Chiayi to their place and to the nearby trail. We love the overall experience of living
with the locals. Water is strong too. The heater is working.

Super friendly host. Would definitely go back next time. Host prepared delicious local breakfast.  Walkable distance from the famous eryanping trail. Host even provide us free ride after we came down from eryanping trail. Highly recommended!

my favourite room from the entire trip, beautiful decor, modern amentities, spacious, and great environment. host was super friendly, invited us over for nice tea and made good recommendations on getting around. breafast provided was simple, but delicious. dinner options were limited, but the hotpot next door was memorable with the freshest veggies, and generous portions. highly recommend the pumpkin soup base, condiment sauce was also very nice. will definitely come back for the great hospitality and food.

description.summary: We are located at Alishan Rd. around 55.5km, Convenient transportation, bus stop is beside, near the gas station, and 24H convenience store. Warm and comfortable private room. In here, you can enjoy spectacular cloud sea, sunrise and sunset.

ãƒ»Public Transport - From Airport to take Taiwan High Speed Rail / Taiwan Railway to Chiayi Station and then take Alishan Bus to Alishan, but get down the bus at Xiding (around 1.5 hrs), our place is just next to the bus stop.

ãƒ»Self-driving - We can provide route guide for you, free parking.

ãƒ»Pick-up - Whether you're coming from airport, downtown, train station, sun moon lake or other sightseeing location, for your connivence, we can provide charter car for you, fairly charge, feel free to inquire.

description.summary: "Enzo House" is a 5-storey Baroque building built by the Ye family in 1953, next to the Keelung DianJi Temple. It was later taken over by Doctor Xu as a personal home and clinic. Our team has recently restored the building, including cleaning the stairs, reusing cypress interiors, and preserving original lighting fixtures and furniture for a historic stayÂ experience.
description.space: Experience the perfect blend of nostalgia and modern comfort at our recently renovated and restored home in KeeLung. After 2 years of meticulous work, we're excited to welcome you to our newly remodeled space, complete with all the amenities you need while preserving the character and charm of the originalÂ oldÂ house.
description.access: Our rooms offer the perfect combination of privacy and modern amenities, including attached bathrooms. Guests can also enjoy access to our shared spaces on the second floor, including a fully-equipped kitchen and dining area for a comfortableÂ stay.

description.transit:
Parking
The nearest parking is the next-door basement parking. (Private)

Public parking available at Boai Market B1 (5 minutes walk), Ren Ai Elementary school  (5 minutes walk)  and  Keelung E Square Mall (7 minutes walk). Sometimes, there are parking spaces by the roadside in our location.

Distance to various destinations.
Keelung port 600m/9mins
Keelung bus station 850m/12mins
Keelung train station 900m/13mins
Maritime Museum, Wang You valley, Chaojing Park 15-20 mins  / car ride
Jiufen,  Jinguashi, Shifen old street 30 mins / car ride
Taipei city 50 mins / car ride
description.house_rules:
Dear Guest

Welcome to Enzo House
In order to ensure the safety and personal privacy during your stay, please read this notice in detail. 
Thank you for your cooperation and we wish you have a pleasant stay with us. 

1.
Check-in time 3:00 am
Check-out time before 11:00 am
An overtime charge of NT$200/hr will be charged. 
2.
Do remember your room number and memorize the emergency escape route and the location of the fire extinguisher to ensure immediate response in the event of an emergency
3.
Do not jump or climb on railings when taking an elevator or going up and down stairs
4.
After 10:00 pm, please lower the volume and refrain from making loud noises.
5.
According to the Smoking Hazard Prevention Act, smoking is strictly prohibited in this building. We will charge a fee of NT$2000 to clean the room. 
6.
Do not use any stoves or heater to dry clothes, to prevent fire hazard. Dryer is available in our common area.
7.
Do not drink excessive alcohol, take drugs, or gamble in the guest room. Do not bring any dangerous or prohibited items.
8.
Please do not damage the equipment in the room, and do not take out the items in the room. If you cause any damage to the room during your stay, a fee will be charged according to the degree of damage.
9. 
The luggage storage is a free service, which is only for storage and is not responsible for safekeeping. 
The luggage Storage is not liable for any damage and/or natural deterioration of luggage or of personal items stored.
The luggage Storage is not liable in any capacity for damage or loss due to unforeseeable events, force majeure and/or natural occurrences.
Perishable and dangerous are prohibited. Do bring your valuables and important documents with you at all times.

10.
Note to long-term renters

Except for Wednesday and Sunday, there will be garbage trucks parked opposite at 1450hrs and 2050hrs
Please dispose of the garbage by yourself. The garbage bags are available in the locker.

The laundry fee for pillow cases, bed covers, duvet covers (excluding towels). 
There is a service fee of NT$200, If you need our staff to change it for you

recent.comments: Owner was helpful and flexible with the check-in time as our flight touched down early. We were able to drop off our suitcases and started our trip earlier. Location is great as it is close to 101 and MRT. As a result, you will never be short of shopping ideas and good food. Making this stay even better, the owner can install some shower curtains. Overall, we had a great stay.

Location is great as it is close to 101 and MRT. As a result, you will never be short of shopping ideas and good food. Making this stay even better, the owner can install some shower curtains. Overall, we had a great stay.
Nice place to stay in Taipei

Location is near restaurants and convenience store. Around 10-15 mins walks from nearest MRT station.
Facilities are provided following their promise.

However some slight issue is about the bed. the bottom part of the bed is smaller from the top part of the bed, so we almost fell down when sleep at night, if sleep near the corner of the bed. However it is just 2 out of 5 beds in that conditions.

name: Mahalo Surf B&B at Sanshuei Beach
title: Sanshuei, Magong, Penghu æ¾æ¹–ç¸£, Taiwan

location.address: Sanshuei, Magong, Penghu æ¾æ¹–ç¸£, Penghu, Taiwan, Taiwan

items.comments:
We enjoyed our stay at Mahalo during the summer of 2020.  As residents of Taiwan, we were fortunate to be able to travel domestically to the beautiful islands of Penghu.  Mahalo is right across from Shanshui Beach, which is the most beautiful beach we have seen in Taiwan; the water was clear and blue, and the beach was quiet for most of the day until tour buses drove down later in the afternoon.  We enjoyed our time here so much that we extended our stay for several days.  Karen was welcoming and helpful to us during our stay.  She helped set us up with mopeds, SUP boards, beach umbrellas, and she gave local tips and answered our questions about the area.  She made us a special lunch on our last day, and we were provided with free airport transportation (thanks, Nick!).  
If you visit Penghu, we recommend staying at Mahalo - we look forward to returning again this summer!

Loved the place!  Honestly, the breakfast provided by Karen and her team was amazing.  Location is great - beach is right there, and there are several restaurants near by.  Very quiet part of the island, which is what we were looking for.  

Would stay again.

Location is very close to the beach. Room is as pictured, very clean and comfortable stay at Karen's place. Hosts treated us very warmly, and provided a lot of assistance and travel advice. We enjoyed our stay very much at Mahalo. Highly recommended if you are visiting Penghu and looking for a place away from the city and near to the seaside.

Shanshui beach is just a few steps away from Karen's place. I appreciate the airport pick up and send off, as well as helping me call for Taxis to head down to Town. Definitely the place to stay if your plan is to spend more days in this area.

description.summary: Enjoy the best that Penghu has to offer. Nestled 20 m from the beach with an unobstructed view of Sanshuei beach. All rooms with a view and huge outdoor patios for drinking a coffee or a cold beer and enjoying the stunning view.
description.space: Eco-friendly and modern with a laid back atmosphere. Surrounded by patios to chill out on and enjoy the view. Rooms are spacious with private bathroom. We have a large restaurant serving pizza, sandwiches, an assortment of coffees and other western food.
description.access: Guests are free to use our bodyboards, snorkelling equipment, beach umbrella, outside shower - no charge.
description.neighborhood: Sanshuei Beach is located 12 km from Magong City and 10 km from the airport. The B&B is nestled in a little village along the coast and on Penghu's best beach.
description.transit: We will pick you up from the airport and drop you off at no extra charge. We also have scooters to rent and cars can be rented in town. There's also a bus that goes into town.

name: A cozy cat b&b DORIS HOME in Sun Moon Lake
title: Yuchi Township, Taiwan

hosts.about: I'm the host of DORIS HOME, a cat theme b&b located at Sun Moon Lake in Taiwan. You would love this small town if you spend some time with those beautiful bicycle and walking trails. Come to Sun Moon Lake and you would enjoy your vacation with cats.

description.summary: DORIS HOME is a cat-theme B&B with many cats in Sun Moon Lake. It is close to Shuishe Visitor Center, Shuishe Pier, Maolan Mountain Trail, and Xiangshan Bikeway in 10 minutes walking distance. We have one comfortable queen-size bed, spacious bathroom and hill view in this room. If you like a little sense of design with cozy easy space, DORIS HOME is your good choice to stay in Sun Moon Lake.
description.space:
â˜† 5 cute cats around
â˜† Room space is 26 square meters and bed size is 182cm*188cm
â˜† Homemade breakfast from 8am to 10am
â˜† Italian shampoo, conditioner, body soap, body lotion
description.access: Except the room you stay, you could also spend some time in our public area on 1st floor. We have fresh coffee and Sun Moon Lake black tea anytime. You could enjoy a short break with our cats and take a rest.
description.notes:
Please consider again if you are allergic to cats.
We are next to a green hill so that you might meet some bugs or  mosquitoes easily.
We are located at a quiet lane, please help us to keep the peace during your stay.

No stay for children under 12 years old for safety reasons.
description.neighborhood:
There is a Maolan Moutain Trail close to our house and you could hike to the top in 1 hour. There is a good view of Sun Moon Lake if you reach the top.
Next to our building, there are 2 beautiful Japanese old houses on a hill which was built on 1936. Although they are not allowed to visit but you could see them gracefully standing there.
description.transit: 5 minutes walking distance to Shuishe Visitor Center, 10 minutes walking to Shuishe Pier. 7 minutes walking to a 7-11 shop, 8 minutes walking to a Starbucks. 10 minutes walking to the entrance of Xiangshan Bikeway. 10 minutes walking to the entrance of Hanbi Trail.
description.interaction: My family or I will be here to welcome you, but won't bother you too much. We will be around when you need us.

å¾ˆæ£’çš„åœ°æ–¹  æˆ¿é–“ä¹¾æ·¨ æ–°ç©  åœ°é»å¥½å°±åœ¨æ°´ç¤¾ç¢¼é ­  åƒå–é€›è¡—è²·æ±è¥¿ éƒ½å¾ˆæ–¹ä¾¿  æ—©é¤è±å¯Œå¥½åƒ å°¤å…¶æ˜¯åƒåŠ è€é—†å°è¦½çš„æ¸…æ™¨ç’°æ¹–ç§˜å¢ƒè…³è¸è»ŠéŠå¾Œ   å…¨å®¶éƒ½å¾ˆå–œæ­¡

Wayne was very responsive when we checked with him stuff prior to the trip. He waited for us past 7pm cos we reached late! He didn't rush thru the explanation and took his time to explain to us slowly and clearly. 

The morning tour which was free was wonderful as we got to see different side of sun moon lake with a local. It was such a ptiy that there wasn't any nice sun rise that morning. Had difficulty cycling and Wayne was nice to ensure that we didnt miss out too much. He also took nice photos of us!

The room was bright and spacious and we love the design which was modern and zen. There are also ample of space to put luggages.

Breakfast was also sumptuous and homely, especially after a 4 hour cycling session! (We took our time to cycle).

Thanks Wayne!

description.space: Laurel Villa opened its doors in January 2004. Since then we've had the privilege of serving guests from all over the world and are grateful for all the support and encouragement we've received.We strive to live in harmony with nature and hope our guest can experience it by providing the most natural and comfortable living environment along with fresh and healthy meals.Take a break from your busy schedule, visit us on your next trip to Sun Moon Lake and allow us to be part of your experience. We hope you'll be able to find peace and tranquil during your stay with us.
description.notes: Should you require us to recommend a sightseeing itinerary of Sun Moon Lake, feel free to enquire with us upon your arrival. We are more than happy to provide an introduction of the area and will discuss a suitable sightseeing schedule based on your duration of stay, interests and current weather conditions (different guests will have a unique schedule tailored to their needs).
description.neighborhood:
Shopping, food, accommodation, transport, parking and some of the attractions at Sun Moon Lake are within walking distance from Laurel Villa. 

Information of the various attractions is also readily available. 

Laurel Villa is accessible by car, scooter or public transport. 

After arriving at Sun Moon Lake, the best way to enjoy the scenery is to take a leisure stroll along some of the footpaths. Other than admiring the view of lake and the central mountain ranges in Taiwan, you can also see Wunwu Temple, Lalu Island, Cihen Pagoda, Syuanzang Temple, Syuanguang Temple and Ita Thao.

Should you require further information on the attractions of Sun Moon Lake, we will be glad to help you in planning a customized itinerary to meet your preferences or time constraints.

- Places within 1~3 minute of walking -
Shueishe pier (Sun Moon Lake's main pier)
Shueishe Lakeside Trail
Meihe Gardens (Strategic location for panoramic sight of the lake)
Hanbhi Hiking Trail (The late President CKS's favourite pathway)
7-Eleven, Starbucks
Zhong Xin Road carpark

- Places within 5 minutes of walking -
Shueishe Visitors Center
Restaurant and eateries serving Chinese, Western and local cuisine
Bus stop for public buses (plying local routes and areas outside Sun Moon Lake) 
Gift shops, specialty shops, pharmacy, bike and scooters for rent

- Places within 10 minutes of walking -
Longfong Temple & Matchmaker
Wen Wan Resort, Lalu Hotel & Teacher's Hostel
Chaowu pier

- Places within 30 minutes of walking -
Shueishe Dam Lakeside Trail
Bamboo Rock Garden
Mt. Maolan Hiking Trail
description.interaction: Almost every morning where weather allows, we will lead guests to view Sun Moon Lake's sunrise, grand morning scenery and provide introduction. This early morning activity will be entirely different from the other day activities available, hence we strongly recommend this activity to personally experience and appreciate Sun Moon Lake!
description.house_rules:
When checking in, please present your identification for verification and registration.
After 20:00, please lower the volume and forbidden to maintain the quality of your stay.
According to the smoke prevention method, the hotel is completely non-smoking, including rooms, bathrooms and balconies.
Please don't bring any drugs and dangerous goods (including any prohibited goods). If you have any illegal behavior, we must call the police.
Please be informed that we do not accept pets. Do not bring mahjong.
The kitchen and bar are not open to the public. Please inform in advance if you have any additional needs.
Do not use dangerous goods such as gas stoves or induction cookers indoors. Please turn off the power and save water.
If there is a demand for parking, it can be parked at the rear of Zhongxing Public Car Park. Guests staying at the hotel can enjoy preferential parking rates.
Do not arbitrarily move indoors (such as a bed). When you leave the room, please lock the door with your hand. Please keep your valuables carefully. When you check out, please return the door card.

recent.comments: Julien is such a great, accommodating host, as well as a delightful person. She went out of her way to help us with everything we needed, and even gave us a ride in her car to Dulan on her way to Taitung after checkout. The room itself is clean and spacious with a large shower and excellent water pressure.

description.summary:
Our villa is 2 miles away from train station and welcome you to spend a casual vacation here. The villa is surrounded by pool and hence we call it Island Sunrise. 

Breakfast, free parking, free WIFI, bed linen, towels and toiletries are provided and all rooms are en-suite; A 7-seat van is available for booking to take you around the beautiful county.

Double and quad rooms are available and our quote is based on the number of room required. Please let us know your request before booking.
description.space:
Breakfast, free parking, free WIFI, bed linen, towels and toiletries are provided and all rooms are en-suite.

We are 2 miles away from Luodong train station and you can easily call a taxi to our villa for TWD130
description.notes: Airport pick up (TWD2,000) and 9 hours day tour (TWD3,000) is available for booking with a 7-seat van to take you around the beautiful county.
description.neighborhood: We are two miles away from the Luodong train station.  Luodong is the biggest town in Yilan county, and most famous for its night market.
description.transit: Free parking and easy to call a taxi.
description.interaction: we live nearby and you can text us or call us before 10pm.

recent.comments: The location is great with wonderful view.

items.comments: The location is great with wonderful view.

Overall a nice stay. The view is amazing. Place as described in pictures. A little difficult to get to, but can walk the street of jiufen along the way to get there so it was still ok! Would have stayed more nights!
instructions to find the tea house could be better, just at the end of jiufen street would be easier.

Itâ€™s hard to find an Airbnb thatâ€™s exactly like the picture shown. Beautiful beautiful scenery and host was really responsive. Giving us really clear instructions as to how to get to the accommodation. Breakfast with a view as well. Everything was just perfect. Thank you!

The place was beautiful and breathtaking.  It was really homey and comfortable. Satine was a great hosts, she was proactive in communicating instructions allowing us to plan ahead. The place provides a nice, filling breakfast, too.  Amazing stay, highly recommend.

description.summary:
Jiufen Shan-Hai-Guan guesthouse is located on the old street of Jiufen.
we have 5 different rooms : Double Room with Sea View, Room Sakura with Sea View, Room Caramel Macchiato with Sea View,  Double Room with Sea view balcony, Family Room with Sea view.
description.space: You can sit on the chair and enjoy the great view from the window in this room.
description.notes:
we don't have pick-up service,and taxis can not come inside the old street to our front door. you'll have to walk along the Jishan street about 15 minutes to our guesthouse. 
we are in the mountains, so you might see insects, frogs or squirrels on the way to your room. our rooms are all on the 3rd and 4th floor without elevator. youâ€™ll have to carry your own luggage to your room.  
so if you are afraid of these creatures,or if you have heavy luggage or elderly companion who is not able to climb stairs, please consider this situation before booking the room.
description.neighborhood: we are on Jiufen old street.
description.transit: Please get off the bus at 'Jiufen Old Street' stop and go uphill a bit, then you'll see 7-11. The small alley next to 7-11 is the old street. Please walk along the old street about 10 minutes to NO. 150 and you'll see Shan-Hai-Guan tea house (å±±æµ·è§€èŒ¶åŠ). please check in there.

name: Room Sakura with Sea View ( on Jiufen old street)
title: Ruifang District, Taiwan

location.address: Ruifang District, New Taipei City, Taiwan

recent.comments:
The place has breathtaking views of the sea, mountains and landscape. absolutely stunning in the day and night with its own unique Jiufen beauty. 

location was also very convenient and accessible as it is at the immediate end of Jiufen Old Street so u can enjoy the peak view, food and shopping prior.

Bathtub is also huge and very enjoyable, so do take some time to start filling in advance! 

Would love to stay again in the future. jiufen and this place has our hearts

items.comments:
The place has breathtaking views of the sea, mountains and landscape. absolutely stunning in the day and night with its own unique Jiufen beauty. 

location was also very convenient and accessible as it is at the immediate end of Jiufen Old Street so u can enjoy the peak view, food and shopping prior.

Bathtub is also huge and very enjoyable, so do take some time to start filling in advance! 

Would love to stay again in the future. jiufen and this place has our hearts

This Airbnb is in the mountains of Jiufen. If you decide to spend the night here, just bring your backpack, because it is very difficult to come with suitcase. Next to the Airbnb there are some restaurants and food stalls. You also have a beautiful tea house and the old streets of Juifen. The apartment itself is very nice, with a bathtub in the living room, a big bed, tv and shower cabin.
Almost all good. Thank you very much

Excellent room as described, including cool air-conditioning for the summer. Some noise overnight from insects (which was in room description and not a problem for us). Check in and out was at their tea house.

This place was amazing! Great view, incredible bathtub. We would stay here again. As you may know, everything in this city is a bit hard to get to, so expect to walk with your luggage. It was fine for us but may be more difficult for people who are less mobile.

description.summary:
Jiufen Shan-Hai-Guan guesthouse
we have 5 different rooms : Room Sakura with Sea View, Room Caramel Macchiato with Sea View, Double Room with Sea View, Double Room with Sea view balcony, Family Room with Sea view.
description.space: Room Sakura with sea view is a Japanese style room. You can enjoy the sea view from the bedroom window. There will be a double bed (futon) for 2 people to stay. You can have a nice bath under a cherry tree in this room.
description.notes:
we don't have pick-up service,and taxis can not come inside the old street to our front door.  you'll have to walk along the Jishan street about 12 minutes to our guesthouse.
    we are in the mountains, so you might see insects, frogs or squirrels on the way to your room.  our rooms are all on the 3rd and 4th floor without elevator. youâ€™ll have to carry your own luggage to your room.
    so if you are afraid of these creatures,or if you have heavy luggage or elderly companion who is not able to climb stairs, please consider this situation before booking the room.
description.transit:
We are on the end of Jiufen old street (Jishan St.). Just walk along the old street from the entrance about 10 minutes and you'll find our tea house at NO. 150 (å±±æµ·è§€èŒ¶åŠ). Please check in there.
we don't have pick-up service,and taxis or cars can not come inside the old street to our front door.

name: Tranquil Master BR: Views, Fresh Air, Massage Tub
title: Yangmei District, Taiwan

hosts.about: I travel between Taiwan and US California from time to time and visit many countries. Love to meet new friends, and learn new things. I appreciate every opportunity to interact and share with others. Life is short, every moment is a precious gift. Treat yourself and others well with kindness.

description.summary: This luxurious villa offers scenic views, a tranquil atmosphere & fresh air.  The master bedroom with a spa tub overlooking the green hill & golf course. Complimentary coffee, tea, WIFI, and tour info are available, Access to facilities under Dongsen Club such as the swimming pool, gym, warm springs, and Massage Service are available with a minimum fee.  Nearby restaurants, convenient markets, and attractions, including historic trails, parks, and cultural landmarks. Come to recharge & relax!
description.space: Two free Private Parking Spaces & Additive Guest Parking Are Available. 4-Story House with Elevator. This Master Bedroom is on the 4th Floor and Can Directly Access the Rooftop balcony to View The SURROUNDING GREEN MOUNTAINS. This Room has European Design Elements. It has a Private working desk, cabinet, walk-in closet, stylish bathroom with massage spa tub, AC, and balcony area where you can have a 360-degree view of the scenery. AC and fans are available. we provide bottled water, sheet, and towel.
description.access: The living room and kitchen are public areas. TV in the living room has a set-top box (hundreds of channels &  entertainment/sports/news programs in multi-county languages).   Guest can use all appliances (refrigerator, microwave, dishwasher, gas stove, toast machine, washer, etc), utensils, plates, cups, tea, and coffee.  Please feel free to enjoy fresh fruit and a small snack if they are available at the kitchen table. Two free car parking spaces and additional street parking/ guest parking are available on a first come first serve base.
description.notes: Please prepare your own toothbrush and toothpaste.  If you want to use the club facilities, please bring your own swimming wear.
description.neighborhood: This Villa is sitting on a hillside community nearby the Lido Forestry Spa Resort. The area is very quiet and secure, the entrance has a 24x7 security gate and guard. There are many trees, greens, and flowers surrounding them. Nearby has convenient stores and restaurants. Less than a 10-minute drive to downtown.
description.transit: Two car parking space is available at the front door driveway.   Additional street parking and guest parking are also available.   If you are not driving, taking Taxi or Uber are convenient.  About 25 min drive from the Taoyuan International Airport.
description.interaction: If you need any assistance, please contact me (either by phone or text) me at any time.

items.comments:
This is an eccentric little stay about a 7 minute drive from Sun Moon Lake, best accessible by car or scooter. The place is as pictured - a colorful interior with lots of personality in the middle of a palm forest. Our host was quickly responsive as we were initially unable to locate the place (I recommend requesting the address from him directly, as the one listed on the Airbnb, likely due to translation, is incorrect) and he gave us some tips for a delicious dinner place in Puli. Also, the place is down the road from a lane that sparkles with hundreds of fireflies from dusk to midnight during the spring (Youshui lane, closest to Miracolo View Hotel), which makes for a romantic evening walk. 
The accommodations were almost there, as we ran into some puzzling situations (i.e. all but one of the electrical outlets were saran-wrapped over so we couldnâ€™t use them), but overall it met our needs.

Very nice, quiet, clean place with a balcony.  You definitely need a car or scooter to reach this place and explore the surroundings, but I highly recommend staying a bit farther north from the lake and its touristy environs. The paths and sights and restaurants and tea cafes around the bnb were wonderful to explore! The owner is very friendly and helpfully picked us up as the bnb was a bit farther than I initially thought.

Wow! Just like the photos, this place was breathtaking! An absolutely stunning room with ceiling high windows overlooking nature and a balcony to soak up the views. We loved the huge bath and comfortable bed, we slept so well and didnâ€™t want to leave! 

Our host went above and beyond to make our stay for Christmas enjoyable. Helping us to get to sun moon lake and surprising us with coffees Christmas morning- he was so kind- thank you! We are an English speaking couple and although the host does not speak English, we could communicate by translate fine.

A note to any English speakers, the address on Airbnb when copied into Gmaps is incorrect. The property is about another 5 min drive away. If you ask the host for the address, check his response in your email (not Airbnb app as this will automatically translate into English) for the Chinese symbols and paste this into Gmaps to find the address.

recent.comments: Very nice view. Clean and comfortable. The location is good for driving with free parking.

items.comments: Very nice view. Clean and comfortable. The location is good for driving with free parking.
friendly and nice host. simple yet delicious breakfast too

Room was nice and host was good. We had to ask a bit in order to get information, but overall it was ok. Our room was one storey down from the lobby, not that ideal because we were blocked partially by a tree at the balcony and more shrubs at the tv side. Guess the vegetation must have grown a bit from the time the advertised pictures were taken. So ask for a higher floor to have better views. We took public bus transport around the area to get to the sheep farm and little swiss garden, it's not walkable from the accommodation.
Margaret gave useful instructions for us before check in. The room looks exactly like the picture. Love the breakfast spread too. Enjoy our stay there.

recent.comments:
The space provided us with everything we needed, and more. The surroundings really complemented the stay at the tiny house. The sound of the sea, the breeze, and the every now and again a passing train was really calming. The place is remote and you feel alone during the night, but the friendly roaming dogs will keep you company and make you feel safe.
However, the real highlight of the stay are the friendly and accommodating hosts. They went above and beyond to ensure our comfort and needs throughout our entire visit. We went by train and were offered to be driven to the supermarket to buy supplies for our stay. They came to check if everything was okay. We highly recommend this place and will most likely go back when there's a chance. 5 stars for the place itself, and an extra star for the amazing hosts!

items.comments:
The space provided us with everything we needed, and more. The surroundings really complemented the stay at the tiny house. The sound of the sea, the breeze, and the every now and again a passing train was really calming. The place is remote and you feel alone during the night, but the friendly roaming dogs will keep you company and make you feel safe.
However, the real highlight of the stay are the friendly and accommodating hosts. They went above and beyond to ensure our comfort and needs throughout our entire visit. We went by train and were offered to be driven to the supermarket to buy supplies for our stay. They came to check if everything was okay. We highly recommend this place and will most likely go back when there's a chance. 5 stars for the place itself, and an extra star for the amazing hosts!

If you are looking for a getaway, this is the place I would recomand. I had an amazing time waking up seeing the sunrise coming up from the ocean and the beautiful mountains behind me. This is a very friendly place if you are an urban person trying to reaching out to nature. You will be all alone and that what I was looking for. 
The cabin is well maintained, clean, modern and in a very beautiful location. There lots to explore in nearby areas. 
The host is amazing, he offered to take me around and checked if I needed anything during my stay. Friendly and cares about his guests.
24hr 7-11 is just 6 min drive so you really can reach out to supplies anytime.
Air-conditioning during summer is excellent. The toilet is great and the bed is very comfy.
When it comes to security, nothing to worry about, I saw a police car petroling the area and there were watch dogs. Taiwan is a very safe anyway, so we had no concerns.
I am certainly considering this as one of my favorites stay.

recent.comments:
We stayed in the room on the first floor. The the host was very responsive. You do need to speak a bit of Chinese to communicate. The location has beautiful mountain views especially in the morning. It is also very close to Cingjing Farm.

The room itself looked like the pictures and is pet friendly which was a big factor in my choice ğŸ™‚ The only issue would be the first floor room has only 1 small window looking out, so the room can start to feel a bit cramped.  Also, if you have an anxious dog, it would be better to stay in one of their rooms on the 2nd floor as the foot traffic and local dogs outside may cause them to bark. 

Breakfast is a ham sandwich every morning at 8am with a packet of either milk tea or milk chocolate which you can mix yourself. 

All in all, worth the price.

name: AUG hot sale 5 bedrooms &4 bathrooms/unique Villa
title: Xinyi District, Taiwan

recent.comments:
Very special space, children like it very much
Specially booked because of the layout of the room and the space for the dining table
The kids are clamoring for a photoshoot, it really looks like the photo on the website
At first, I read the comments saying that the house will smell and smell of smoke
We all have nasal allergies and are worried
I am also afraid that children will inhale second-hand smoke
But there is no smell at all after staying for 10 days
Recommended for family to come here to relax

items.comments:
Very special space, children like it very much
Specially booked because of the layout of the room and the space for the dining table
The kids are clamoring for a photoshoot, it really looks like the photo on the website
At first, I read the comments saying that the house will smell and smell of smoke
We all have nasal allergies and are worried
I am also afraid that children will inhale second-hand smoke
But there is no smell at all after staying for 10 days
Recommended for family to come here to relax

we had mixed feelings about this stay. the host(s) was very responsive and tried to be helpful whenever they could, even helping to deliver a package to us.  they also provided weekly cleanings free of charge.  the issue really lies with the property as that it is an old property and could really use some maintenance and TLC.  there is a very noticeable odor (almost like sewage) in two of the bathrooms,  flickering lights in the closet, and the garden was simply not usable which was disappointing as that was one of the reasons why we booked here.  On one of the last nights, we smelled cigarette smoke coming in from one of the adjacent units (where their family member lives) and then we had to move from upstairs to downstairs because of the smoke. out of principle, we asked for a 15,000 TWD refund since that was the "fine" they themselves had posted (none of us smoke) which was ultimately not granted.  they were nice enough to give us a later checkout of noon instead of 11am.
Great location and communication.  Good space for big groups.

Location was great with lots of restaurants and shopping malls around. However, had to wait for the host when we arrive to get inside (a bit chaotic on the street with 5 kids around) There was a terrible smell in the toilets. We asked for baby amenities before checking in, but we couldnt find them on the first day (we left on 3rd morning so not very useful even if they were brought out from the storage room on 2nd day, it was chaotic to bath two <1 year olds in an adult bath tub on arrival day). 
We asked for 2 hour late check out and the charge we were told was TWD 1000 per hour (not sure if thats the average price, but it sounds pricey for us). Overall we thought this place was overpriced and over-rated. With this price we could get 5 hotel rooms without terrible toilets and functioning air-conditioning. CP value is not great except for the location. I must say I would rate much higher if its just half priced.

description.notes:
Our place is about 5-10mins drive away from Sun Moon Lake.
For transportation, we can help to do pick up from Sun Moon Lake Shuishe Visitor Centre or Shuili Railway Station, but with a fuel sharing fee of Twd 100~200 per one way trip for 2-4 guests, or you can choose to take a taxi into our village which is around Twd 300-500 per trip.
If you arrive early, you can deposit your luggage at the Shuishe Visitor Center and then start your tour at Sun Moon Lake.
At Sun Moon Lake, you can consider the 3-in-1 package ticket which is around Twd 380. The price includes the ferry, the cable car and the round lake bus ride. 
Or you can rent a bicycle and cycle around. Have an idea that the bicycle rental is around Twd 200 per day. You can communicate on the price with the owner just in case they offer you at a more expensive price.
Usually we will help to pick up our guests after they had their dinner as our place is at a quiet village. There's no shops or eating places around.
We suggest our guests to come to our place before 7pm. Have a good shower and then join us for some campfire and tea after 8pm. We'll rest at around 9pm.

recent.comments: Fantastic BnB to be in! 7min walk to busstop that goes to Taroko Gorge. Clean bedroom. Lovely breakfast. Umama was super kind to pick us up and drop us off at the train station. They grow their own coffee plants too, and serve coffee daily from the beans in their own garden. I'd visit again in a heartbeat, but only if it's a Friday when the night market is open, because there's really nothing much to do in the town.

items.comments: Fantastic BnB to be in! 7min walk to busstop that goes to Taroko Gorge. Clean bedroom. Lovely breakfast. Umama was super kind to pick us up and drop us off at the train station. They grow their own coffee plants too, and serve coffee daily from the beans in their own garden. I'd visit again in a heartbeat, but only if it's a Friday when the night market is open, because there's really nothing much to do in the town.
Very hospitable lovely stay. The location provide a wonderful view and easy access to both the mountains and sea.
Beautiful location and great coffee and breakfast! This is a excellent place to stay if you want to get out of city life and spend some time in nature!

description.summary:
**The correct map address to be entered on your maps is èŠ±è“®éµé“æ‰‹ä½œæ°‘å®¿, not 100 Xiulin Township**. This is due to some geographical discrepancies on the map.

Authentic Bed & Breakfast near Taroko Gorge, close to the mountains and the sea. We are a passionate Truku aboriginal family. It is easily accessible by train and the bus stop is near to the National Park. We rent bicycles, and can prepare you an authentic Truku meal, which you will not experience with city life.
description.space:
Authentic Bed & Breakfast near Taroko Gorge, close to the mountains and the sea. We are a passionate Truku aboriginal family. It is easily accessible by train and the bus stop is near to the National Park. We rent bicycles, and can prepare you an authentic Truku meal, which you will not experience with city life.
- Recommendations for hiking/trekking itineraries and other fun things to do near Taroko. 
- We can help to coordinate with staff for canyoning trips, if you wish to try that out.

We can provide the following for additional charge:
-Pick-up from Hualien train station
- Mountain bicycles, basic gear, map and transport to locations within Taroko National Park 
- Authentic aboriginal meals including do-it-yourself craft-making (with a 3 day notice)
- For Chinese speakers, we can give personal tours of Taroko gorge which include aboriginal outdoor activities (half and day trips available)
-Canyoning Trips (A highlight of the area)

Feel free to ask us questions about the area or local culture.

recent.comments: Misrepresentation of the place, there is no wardrobe which was in the picture and the place is tiny-would not spend much time there other than to sleep. There is no tea or coffee or appliances other than refrigerator. Be aware that the shower doubles as the bathroom so when showering the water will get all over the bathroom floor. Noisy with loud night club music heard throughout the night but host did warn in advance. Otherwise good location and very convenient. Very clean.

items.comments: Misrepresentation of the place, there is no wardrobe which was in the picture and the place is tiny-would not spend much time there other than to sleep. Has everything I need while visiting family and work during the night. Great internet, clean, hot water, and air conditioning. There is a nightclub on 1st floor, but I hardly heard from the room.

Booked very last minute, great price, flexible check-in. Room is in a happening part of town, above a Starbucks, movie theatre and club with lots of activity at night, but the room was perfectly quiet and clean, good wifi, shower and bed.

items.comments: Really nice place and had good views. Nice breakfast as well. The shortcut was a bit difficult to find and there were some insects but it was to be expected for the place we were at. Overall great experience
Everything was lovely. The view of the mountains was spectacular! The hosts were very kind and helpful. We would definitely stay here again!
